GE07bhg4c06u:1: anāśritaḥ karma-phalaṃ kāryaṃ karma karoti yaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:2: sa saṃnyāsī ca yogī ca na niragnir na cākriyaḥ ||1||
GE07bhg4c06u:4: citte śuddhe 'pi na dhyānaṃ vinā saṃnyāsa-mātrataḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:5: muktiḥ syād iti ṣaṣṭhe 'smin dhyāna-yogo vitanvate ||
GE07bhg4c06u:7: tatra tāvat sarva-karmāṇi manasā saṃnyasya [Gītā 5.13] ity ārabhya saṃnyāsa-pūrvikāyā jñāna-niṣṭhāyās tātparyenābhidhānād duḥkha-rūpatvāc ca karmaṇaḥ sahasā saṃnyāsātiprasaṅgaṃ prāptaṃ vārayituṃ saṃnyāsād api śreṣṭhatvena karma-yogaṃ stauti anāśrita iti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c06u:9: anāśrito 'napekṣamāṇaḥ sann avaśya-kāryatayā vihitaṃ karma yaḥ karoti, sa eva saṃnyāsī yogī ca na tu niragnir agni-sādhyeṣṭākhya-karma-tyāgī |
GE07bhg4c06u:12: yoga-sūtraṃ tribhiḥ ślokaiḥ pañcamānte yad īritam |
GE07bhg4c06u:14: tatra sarva-karma-tyāgena yogaṃ vidhāsyaṃs tyājyatvena hīnatvam āśaṅkya karma-yogaṃ stauti anāśrita iti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c06u:16: 'napekṣamāṇaḥ phalābhisaṃdhi-rahitaḥ san kāryaṃ kartavyatayā śāstreṇa vihitaṃ nityam agnihotrādi karma karoti yaḥ sa karmy api san saṃnyāsī ca yogī ceti stūyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:19: tau cāsya vidyete phala-tyāgāt phala-tṛṣṇā-rūpa-citta-vikṣepābhāvāc ca |
GE07bhg4c06u:23: tasmād ayaṃ yadyapi na niragnir agni-sādhya-śrauta-karma-tyāgī na bhavati, na cākriyo 'gni-nirapekṣa-smārta-kriyā-tyāgī ca na bhavati |
GE07bhg4c06u:25: athavā na niragnir na cākriyaḥ saṃnyāsī yogī ceti mantavyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:26: kintu sāgniḥ sakriyaś ca niṣkāma-karmānuṣṭhāyī saṃnyāsī yogī ceti mantavya iti stūyate
GE07bhg4c06u:27: | apaśavo vā anye go-aśvebhyaḥ paśavo go-aśvān ity atreva praśaṃsā-lakṣaṇayā nañ-anvayopapattiḥ
GE07bhg4c06u:29: sarva-karma-saṃnyāsini labdhe niragnir iti vyarthaṃ syād ity agni-śabdena
GE07bhg4c06u:30: sarvāṇi karmāṇy upalakṣya niragnir iti saṃnyāsī kriyā-śabdena citta-vṛttīr
GE07bhg4c06u:31: upalakṣyākriya iti niruddha-citta-vṛttir yogī ca kathyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:32: tena na niragniḥ saṃnyāsī mantavyo na cākriyo yogī mantavya iti yathā-saṅkhyam
GE07bhg4c06u:34: evaṃ sati nañ-dvayam apy upapannam iti
GE07bhg4c06u:39: aṣṭāṅga-yogābhyāse pravṛttenāpi citta-śodhakaṃ niṣkāma-karma na tyājyam ity āha karma-phalam āśrito 'napekṣamāṇaḥ kāryam avaśya-kartavyatvena
GE07bhg4c06u:40: śāstra-vihitaṃ karma yaḥ karoti, sa eva karma-phala-saṃnyāsāt saṃnyāsī, sa eva viṣaya-bhogeṣu cittābhāvād yogī cocyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:48: proktaṃ karma-yogam aṣṭāṅga-yoga-śiraskam upadekṣyann ādau tau
GE07bhg4c06u:49: tad-upāyatvāt taṃ karma-yogam stauti bhagavān anāśrita iti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c06u:51: avaśya-kartavyatayā vihitaṃ karma yaḥ karoti, sa saṃnyāsī jñāna-yoga-niṣṭhaḥ, yogī cāṣṭāṅga-yoga-niṣṭhaḥ sa eva |
GE07bhg4c06u:55: sannyāsī na cākriyaḥ śarīra-karma-tyāgī ardha-mudrita-netro yogī |
GE07bhg4c06u:56: atra yogam aṣṭāṅgaṃ cikīrṣūṇāṃ sahasā karma na tyājyam iti matam ||1||
GE07bhg4c06u:58: yaṃ saṃnyāsam iti prāhur yogaṃ taṃ viddhi pāṇḍava |
GE07bhg4c06u:59: na hy asaṃnyasta-saṃkalpo yogī bhavati kaścana ||2||
GE07bhg4c06u:60: śrīdharaḥ : kuta ity apekṣāyāṃ karma-yogasyaiva saṃnyāsatvaṃ pratipādayann āha yam iti
GE07bhg4c06u:62: nyāsa evāty arecayat ity ādi śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:65: kuta ity apekṣāyām iti śabdokto hetur yoge 'py astīty āha na
GE07bhg4c06u:67: na saṃnyastaḥ phala-saṃkalpo yena sa karma-niṣṭho jñāna-niṣṭho vā kaścid api na hi yogī bhavati
GE07bhg4c06u:68: ataḥ phala-saṅkalpa-tyāga-sāmyāt saṃnyāsī ca phala-saṅkalpa-tyāgād eva citta-vikṣepābhāvād yogī ca bhavaty eva sa ity arthaḥ ||2||
GE07bhg4c06u:70: guṇa-yogaṃ darśayitum āha yaṃ saṃnyāsam iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:72: sarva-karma-tat-phala-parityāgaṃ saṃnyāsam iti prāhuḥ śrutayaḥ nyāsa evāty
GE07bhg4c06u:73: arecayat, brāhmaṇāḥ puatraiṣaṇāyāś ca vittaiṣaṇāyāś ca lokaiṣaṇāyāś ca vyutthāyātha bhikṣā-caryaṃ caranti ity ādyāḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:75: phala-tṛṣṇā-kartṛtvābhimānayoḥ parityāgena vihita-karmānuṣṭhānaṃ taṃ saṃnyāsaṃ viddhi he pāṇḍava
GE07bhg4c06u:77: vayaṃ manyāmahe brahma-datta-sadṛśo 'yam iti nyāyāt para-śabdaḥ paratra prayujyamānaḥ sādṛśyaṃ bodhayati gauṇyā vṛttyā tad-bhāvāropeṇa vā |
GE07bhg4c06u:78: prakṛte tu kiṃ sādṛśyam ? iti tad āha nahīti |
GE07bhg4c06u:79: hi yasmād asaṃnyasta-saṃkalpo 'tyakta-phala-saṅkalpaḥ kaścana kaścid api yogī na bhavati
GE07bhg4c06u:80: api tu sarvo yogī tyakta-phala-saṅkalpa eva bhavatīti phala-tyāga-sāmyāt tṛṣṇā-rūpa-vitta-vṛtti-nirodha-sāmyāc ca gauṇyā vṛttyā
GE07bhg4c06u:81: karmy eva saṃnyāsī ca yogī ca bhavatīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:95: abhāva-pratyayālambanā vṛttir nidrā [YogaS 1.10] na tu jñānādy-abhāva-mātram ity arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c06u:100: etādṛśāṃ sarvāsāṃ citta-vṛttīnāṃ norodho yoga iti ca samādhir iti ca kathyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:102: viparyaya-bhedas tan-nirodha-mātram api gauṇyā vṛttyā yoga iti saṃnyāsa
GE07bhg4c06u:105: vastutas tathā viṣayebhyaś citta-naiścalyam eva yoga-śabdārthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:107: saṃnyāsa-yoga-śabdayor aikyārtham evāgatam ity āha yam iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:108: asaṃnyasto na saṃnyastas tyaktaḥ saṅkalpaḥ phalākāṅkṣā viṣaya-bhoga-spṛhā yena saḥ ||2||
GE07bhg4c06u:111: sa ca sarvendriya-vyāpārātmake karma-yoge sa saṃnyāsī ca yogī ceti bruvatā
GE07bhg4c06u:112: bhavatā kayā vṛttyā nīyata iti cet tatrāha yam iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:114: artha-tātparya-jñāḥ saṃnyāsṃ prāhus tam eva taṃ yogam aṣṭāṅgaṃ viddhi |
GE07bhg4c06u:116: nanu siṃho mānavakaḥ ity ādau śauryādi-guṇa-sādṛśyena tathā prayogaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:117: prakṛteḥ kiṃ sādṛśyam iti cet tatrāha na hīti |
GE07bhg4c06u:119: kaścana kaścid jñāna-yogy aṣṭāṅga-yogī ca na bhavaty api tu saṃnyasta-saṃkalpa eva bhavatīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:120: saṃnyastaḥ parityaktaḥ saṅkalpaḥ phalecchā ca yena saḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:125: ārurukṣor muner yogaṃ karma kāraṇam ucyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:127: śrīdharaḥ : tarhi yāvaj-jīvaṃ karma-yoga eva prāpta ity āśaṅkya tasyāvadhim āha ārurukṣor iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:132: ārūḍhasya tu tasyaiva dhyāna-niṣṭhasya śamaḥ samādhiś citta-vikṣepaka-karmoparamo jñāna-paripāke kāraṇam ucyate ||3||
GE07bhg4c06u:133: madhusūdanaḥ : tat kiṃ praśastatvāt karma-yoga eva yāvaj-jīvam anuṣṭheya iti nety āha ārurukṣor iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:134: yogam antaḥ-karaṇa-śuddhi-rūpaṃ vairāgyam ārurukṣor āroḍhum icchor na tvārūḍhasya muner bhaviṣyataḥ karma-phala-tṛṣṇā-tyāginaḥ karma śāstra-vihitam agnihotrādi nityaṃ bhagavad-arpaṇa-buddhyā kṛtaṃ kāraṇaṃ yogārohaṇe sādhanam anuṣṭheyam ucyate veda-mukhena mayā |
GE07bhg4c06u:136: vairāgyaṃ prāptavatas tu tasyaiva pūrvaṃ karmiṇo 'pi sataḥ śamaḥ sarva-karma-saṃnyāsa eva kāraṇam anuṣṭheyatayā jñāna-paripāka-sādhanam
GE07bhg4c06u:138: viśvanāthaḥ : nanu tarhy aṣṭāṅga-yogino yāvaj-jīvam eva
GE07bhg4c06u:139: niṣkāma-karma-yogaḥ prāpta ity āśaṅkya tasyāvadhim āha ārurukṣor iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:140: muner yogābhyāsino yogaṃ niścala-dhyāna-yogam āroḍhuṃ icchos tad-ārohe
GE07bhg4c06u:147: baladevaḥ : nanv evam aṣṭāṅga-yogino yāvaj jīvaṃ karmānuṣṭhānaṃ prāptam iti cet tatrāha ārurukṣor iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:150: tasyaiva yogārūḍhasya dhyāna-niṣṭhasya tad-dāḍhye śamo vikṣepaka-karmoparatiḥ
GE07bhg4c06u:153: yadā hi nendriyārtheṣu na karmasv anuṣajjate |
GE07bhg4c06u:155: śrīdharaḥ : kīdṛśo 'yaṃ yogārūḍho yasya śamaḥ kāraṇam ucyata iti ? atrāha yadeti |
GE07bhg4c06u:156: indriyārtheṣv indriya-bhogyeṣu śabdādiśu tat-sādhaneṣu ca karmasu yadā nānuṣajjate āsaktiṃ na karoti |
GE07bhg4c06u:158: bhoga-viṣayān karma-viṣayāṃś ca saṅkalpān saṃnyasituṃ tyaktuṃ śīlaṃ yasya
GE07bhg4c06u:161: madhusūdanaḥ : kadā yogārūḍho bhavatīty ucyate yadeti |
GE07bhg4c06u:162: yadā yasmiṃś citta-samādhāna-kāla indriyārtheṣu śabdādiśu karmasu ca
GE07bhg4c06u:165: prayojanābhāva-buddhyāham eteṣāṃ kartā mamaite bhogyā ity abhiniveśa-rūpam
GE07bhg4c06u:167: hi yasmāt tasmāt sarva-saṅkalpa-saṃnyāsī sarveṣāṃ saṅkalpānām idaṃ mayā kartavyam etat phalaṃ bhoktavyam ity evaṃ rūpāṇāṃ mano-vṛtti-viśeṣāṇāṃ tad-viṣayāṇāṃ ca kāmānāṃ tat-sādhanānāṃ ca karmaṇāṃ tyāga-śīlaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:168: tadā śabdādiṣu karmasu cānuṣaṅgasya tad-dhetoś ca saṅkalpasya yogārohaṇa-pratibandhakasyābhāvād yogaṃ samādhim ārūḍho
GE07bhg4c06u:170: viśvanāthaḥ : samyak-śuddha-cittas tu yogārūḍhas taj-jñāpakaṃ lakṣaṇam āha yadeti |
GE07bhg4c06u:173: indriyārtheṣu śabdādiṣu tat-sādhaneṣu karmasu ca yadātmānanda-rasikaḥ san na sajjate |
GE07bhg4c06u:176: saṅkalpānāsattimūla-bhūtān saṃnyasituṃ parityaktuṃ śīlaṃ yasya saḥ ||4||
GE07bhg4c06u:179: ātmaiva hy ātmano bandhur ātmaiva ripur ātmanaḥ ||5||
GE07bhg4c06u:180: śrīdharaḥ : ato viṣayāsakti-tyāge mokṣaṃ tad-āsaktau ca bandhaṃ paryālocya
GE07bhg4c06u:181: rāgādi-svabhāvaṃ tyajed ity āha uddhared iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:184: na tv avasādayed adho na nayet |
GE07bhg4c06u:188: madhusūdanaḥ : yo yadaivaṃ yogārūḍho bhavati tadā tenātmanaivātmoddhṛto
GE07bhg4c06u:192: manasātmānaṃ svaṃ jīvaṃ saṃsāra-samudre nimagnaṃ tata uddharet |
GE07bhg4c06u:195: na tu viṣayāsaṅgenātmānam avasādayet saṃsāra-samudre majjayet |
GE07bhg4c06u:196: hi yasmād ātmaivātmano bandhur hitakārī saṃsāra-bandhanān mocana-hetur nānyaḥ kaścil laukikasya bandhor api snehānubandhena bandha-hetutvāt |
GE07bhg4c06u:199: bāhyasyāpi ripor ātma-prayuktatvād yuktam avadhāraṇam ātmaivaa ripur ātmana iti ||5||
GE07bhg4c06u:200: viśvanāthaḥ : yasmād indriyārthāsaktyaivātmā saṃsāra-kūpe patitas taṃ yatnenoddhared iti
GE07bhg4c06u:202: viṣayāsakti-sahitena manasā tv ātmānaṃ nāvasādayet na saṃsāra-kūpe pātayet |
GE07bhg4c06u:203: tasmād ātmā mana eva bandhur mana eva ripuḥ ||5||
GE07bhg4c06u:205: viṣayādy-āsakta-manaskatayā saṃsāra-kūpe nimagnam ātmānaṃ jīvam ātmanā
GE07bhg4c06u:206: viṣayāsakti-rahitena manasā tasmād uddhared ūrdhvaṃ haret |
GE07bhg4c06u:207: viṣayāsaktena manasātmānaṃ nāvasādayet tatra na nimajjayet |
GE07bhg4c06u:208: hi niścaye naivam ātmaiva mana evātmanaḥ svasya bandhus tad eva ripuḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:211: bandhāya viṣayāsaṅgo muktyai nirviṣayaṃ manaḥ || iti ||5||
GE07bhg4c06u:215: śrīdharaḥ : katham-bhūtasyātmaiva bandhuḥ ? katham-bhūtasya cātmaiva ripur ity apekṣāyām āha bandhur iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:219: tv ātmaivātmanaḥ śatrutve śatruvad apakāra-kāritve varteta ||6||
GE07bhg4c06u:220: madhusūdanaḥ : idānīṃ kiṃ-lakṣaṇa ātmātmano bandhuḥ kiṃ-lakṣaṇo vātmano ripur ity ucyate bandhur iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:221: ātmā kārya-karaṇa-saṃghāto yena jitaḥ sva-vaśīkṛta ātmanaiva viveka-yuktena manasaiva na tu śastrādinā |
GE07bhg4c06u:228: viśvanāthaḥ : kasya sa bandhuḥ ? kasya sa ripur ity apekṣāyām āha bandhur iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:229: yenātmanā jīvenātmā mano jitas tasya jīvasya sa ātmā mano bandhuḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:230: anātmano 'jita-manasas tv ātmaiva mana eva śatruvat śatrutve 'pakārakatve
GE07bhg4c06u:232: baladevaḥ : kīdṛśasya sa bandhuḥ ? kīdṛśasya sa ripur ity apekṣāyām āha
GE07bhg4c06u:234: yenātmanā jīvenātmā mana eva jitas tasya jīvasya sa ātmā mano bandhus tad-upakārī |
GE07bhg4c06u:240: śrīdharaḥ : jitātmanaḥ svasmin bandhutvaṃ sphuṭayati jitātmana iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:241: jita ātmā yena tasya praśāntasya rāgādi-rahitasyaiva |
GE07bhg4c06u:242: paraṃ kevalam ātmā śītoṣṇādiṣu satsv api samāhitaḥ svātma-niṣṭho bhavati nānyasya |
GE07bhg4c06u:243: yad vā tasya hṛdi paramātmā samāhitaḥ sthito bhavati ||7||
GE07bhg4c06u:244: madhusūdanaḥ : jitātmanaḥ sva-bandhutvaṃ vivṛṇoti jitātmana iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:245: śītoṣṇa-sukha-duḥkheṣu citta-vikṣepa-kareṣu satsv api tathā mānāpamānayoḥ
GE07bhg4c06u:246: pūjā-paribhavayoś citta-vikṣepa-hetvoḥ sator iti teṣu samatveneti vā |
GE07bhg4c06u:247: jitātmanaḥ prāg-uktasya jitendriyasya praśāntasya sarvatra sama-buddhayā
GE07bhg4c06u:248: rāga-dveṣa-śūnyasya paramātmā sva-prakāśa-jñāna-svabhāva ātmā samāhitaḥ samādhi-viṣayo yogārūḍho bhavati |
GE07bhg4c06u:250: jitātmanaḥ praśāntasyaiva paraṃ kevalam ātmā samāhito bhavati nānyasya |
GE07bhg4c06u:251: tasmāj jitātmā praśāntaś ca bhaved ity arthaḥ ||7||
GE07bhg4c06u:252: viśvanāthaḥ : atha yogārūḍhasya cihnāni darśayati tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:254: jita-manasaḥ praśāntasya rāgādi-rahitasya yoginaḥ param atiśayena
GE07bhg4c06u:256: śītādiṣu satsv api mānāpamānayoḥ prāptayor api ||7||
GE07bhg4c06u:257: baladevaḥ : yogārambha-yogyām avasthām āha jiteti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:258: śītoṣṇādiṣu mānāpamānayoś ca jitātmano 'vikṛta-manasaḥ praśāntasya rāgādi-śūnyasyātmā
GE07bhg4c06u:263: śrīdharaḥ : yogārūḍhasya lakṣaṇaṃ śraiṣṭhyaṃ coktam upapādya upasaṃharati
GE07bhg4c06u:265: jñānam aupadeśikaṃ vijñānam aparokṣānubhavaḥ tābhyāṃ tṛpto nirākāṅkṣa ātmā cittaṃ yasya |
GE07bhg4c06u:272: jñānaṃ śāstroktānāṃ padārthānām aupadeśikaṃ jñānaṃ vijñānaṃ tad-aprāmāṇya-śaṅkā-nirākaraṇa-phalena
GE07bhg4c06u:273: vicāreṇa tathaiva teṣāṃ svānubhavenāparokṣīkaraṇaṃ tābhyāḥ tṛptaḥ
GE07bhg4c06u:274: saṃjātālaṃ-pratyaya ātmā cittaṃ yasya sa tathā |
GE07bhg4c06u:281: yogī paramahaṃsa-parivrājakaḥ para-vairāgya-yukto yogārūḍha ity ucyate
GE07bhg4c06u:282: viśvanāthaḥ : jñānam aupadeśikaṃ vijñānam aparokṣānubhavas tābhyāṃ tṛpto
GE07bhg4c06u:289: jñānam śāstrajaṃ vijñānam viviktātmānubhavas tābhyāṃ tṛptātmā pūrṇa-manāḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:298: sādhuṣv api ca pāpeṣu sama-buddhir viśiṣyate ||9||
GE07bhg4c06u:299: śrīdharaḥ : suhṛn-mitrādiṣu sama-buddhi-yuktas tu tato 'pi śreṣṭha ity āha
GE07bhg4c06u:311: eteṣu samā rāga-dveṣādi-śūnyā buddhir yasya sa tu viśiṣṭaḥ ||9||
GE07bhg4c06u:312: madhusūdanaḥ : suhṛn-mitrādiṣu sama-buddhis tu sarva-yogi-śreṣṭha ity āha suhṛd iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:313: suhṛt pratyupakāram anapekṣya pūrva-snehaṃ sambandhaṃ ca vinaivopakartā |
GE07bhg4c06u:322: eteṣu sādhuṣu śāstra-vihita-kāriṣu pāpeṣu śāstra-pratiṣiddha-kāriṣv api |
GE07bhg4c06u:324: anyeṣu ca sarveṣu sama-buddhiḥ kaḥ kīdṛk-karmety avyāpṛta-buddhiḥ sarvatra
GE07bhg4c06u:342: sama-loṣṭāśma-kāñcanād api yoginaḥ sakāśād viśiṣyate śreṣṭho bhavati |
GE07bhg4c06u:354: yogī yuñjīta satatam ātmānaṃ rahasi sthitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:356: śrīdharaḥ : evaṃ yogārūḍhasya lakṣaṇam uktvedānīṃ tasya sāṅgaṃ yogaṃ vidhatte yogīty ādinā sa yogī paramo mata ity antena granthena yogīti |
GE07bhg4c06u:363: yataṃ saṃyataṃ cittam ātmā dehaś ca yasya |
GE07bhg4c06u:367: madhusūdanaḥ : evaṃ yogārūḍhasya lakṣaṇaṃ phalaṃ coktvā tasya sāṅgaṃ yogaṃ vidhatte yogīty ādibhiḥ sa yogī paramo mata ity antais trayoviṃśatyā ślokaiḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:369: yogī yogārūḍha ātmānaṃ cittaṃ satataṃ nirantaraṃ yuñjīta kṣiptam ūḍha-vikṣipta-bhūmi-parityāgenaikāgra-nirodha-bhūmibhyāṃ samāhitaṃ kuryāt |
GE07bhg4c06u:370: rahasi giri-guhādau yoga-pratibandhaka-durjanādi-varjite deśe sthita ekākī tyakta-sarva-gṛha-parijanaḥ saṃnyāsī |
GE07bhg4c06u:371: cittam antaḥ-karaṇam ātmā dehaś ca saṃyatau yoga-pratibandhaka-vyāpāra-śūnyau yasya sa yata-cittātmā
GE07bhg4c06u:373: ataeva cāparigrahaḥ śāstrābhyanujñātenāpi yoga-pratibandhakena parigraheṇa śūnyaḥ ||10||
GE07bhg4c06u:374: viśvanāthaḥ : atha sāṅgaṃ yogaṃ vidhatte yogīty ādinā sa yogī paramo mata ity atas tena |
GE07bhg4c06u:375: yogī yogārūḍha ātmānaṃ mano yuñjīta samādhi-yuktaṃ kuryāt
GE07bhg4c06u:376: baladevaḥ : atha tasya sāṅgaṃ yogam upadiśati yogīty ādi trayoviṃśatyā |
GE07bhg4c06u:378: ātmānaṃ manaḥ satatam aharahar yuñjīta samādhi-yuktaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:381: tatrāpy ekākī dvitīya-śūnyas tatrāpi yata-cittātmā yatau yoga-pratikūla-vyāpāra-varjitau
GE07bhg4c06u:386: śucau deśe pratiṣṭhāpya sthiram āsanam ātmanaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:390: śrīdharaḥ : āsana-niyamaṃ darśayann āha śucāv iti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c06u:391: śuddhe sthāne ātmanaḥ svasya āsanaṃ sthāpayitvā |
GE07bhg4c06u:399: kuśānām upari carma tad upari vastram āstīryetety arthaḥ ||11||
GE07bhg4c06u:401: tatra tasminn āsana upaviśyaikāgraṃ vikṣepa-rahitaṃ manaḥ kṛtvā yogaṃ yuñjyād abhyaset
GE07bhg4c06u:402: yatāḥ saṃyatāś cittasyendriyāṇāṃ ca kriyā yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:404: madhusūdanaḥ : tatrāsana-niyamaṃ darśayann āha śucau deśa iti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c06u:405: śucau svabhāvataḥ saṃskārato vā śuddhe jana-samudāya-rahite nirbhaye
GE07bhg4c06u:406: gaṅgā-taṭa-guhādau deśe sthāne pratiṣṭhāpya sthiram niścalam nātyucchritaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:407: nātyuccaṃ nāpy atinīcam cailājina-kuśottaraṃ cailaṃ mṛdu-vastram ajinaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:408: mṛdu-vyāghrādi-carma te kuśebhya uttare uparitane yasmiṃs tat |
GE07bhg4c06u:416: evam āsanaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya kim kuryād iti tatrāha tatraikāgram iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:417: tatra tasminn āsana upaviśyaiva na tu śayānas tiṣṭhan vā |
GE07bhg4c06u:419: yatāḥ saṃyatā uparatāś cittasyendriyāṇāṃ ca kriyā vṛttayo yena sa yata-cittendriya-kriyaḥ san yogaṃ samādhiṃ yuñjītābhyaset |
GE07bhg4c06u:423: dṛśyate tv agryayā buddhyā sūkṣmayā sūkṣma-darśibhiḥ [KaṭhU 1.3.12] iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:424: kiṃ kṛtvā yogam abhyased iti tatrāha ekāgraṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:432: etad evābhipretya dhyānābhyāsa-prakarṣaṃ vidadhe bhagavān - yogī yuñjīta satataṃ [Gītā 6.10] yuñjyād yogam ātma-viśuddhaye [Gītā 6.12] |
GE07bhg4c06u:438: brahma-sākṣātkāra-yogyatāyai dṛśyate tv agryayā buddhyā [KaṭhU 1.3.12] iti śruteḥ ||11-12||
GE07bhg4c06u:439: baladevaḥ : āsanam āha śucāv iti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c06u:440: śucau svataḥ saṃskārataś ca śuddhe gaṅgā-taṭa-giri-guhādau deśe sthiraṃ niścalam |
GE07bhg4c06u:448: ātmana iti parāsanasya vyāvṛttaye parecchāyau aniyatatvena tasya yoga-pratikūlatvāt |
GE07bhg4c06u:449: tatreti tasmin pratiṣṭhāpite āsane upaviśya, na tu tiṣṭhan śayāno vety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:450: evam āha sūtrakāraḥ -- āsīnaḥ sambhavāt [Vs 4.1.7] iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:451: yatā niruddhāś cittādi-kriyā yasya saḥ mana ekāgram avyākulaṃ kṛtvā yogaṃ yuñjīta samādhim abhyaset |
GE07bhg4c06u:452: ātmano 'ntaḥkaraṇasya viśuddhaye atinairmalyena saukṣmyeṇātma-darśana-yogyatāyai dṛśyate tv agryayā buddhyā sūkṣmayā sūkṣma-darśibhiḥ [KaṭhU 1.3.12] iti śravaṇāt ||11-12||
GE07bhg4c06u:457: manaḥ saṃyamya mac-citto yukta āsīta mat-paraḥ ||14||
GE07bhg4c06u:458: śrīdharaḥ : cittaikāgryāpayoginīṃ dehādhikāriṇāṃ darśayann āha samam iti
GE07bhg4c06u:461: kāyaś ca śiraś ca grīvā ca kāya-śiro-grīvam |
GE07bhg4c06u:466: svīyaṃ nāsikāgraṃ samprekṣya ity ardha-nimīlita-netra ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:467: itas tato diśaś cānavalokayan āsīta ity uttareṇānvayaḥ ||13||
GE07bhg4c06u:474: aham eva paraṃ puruṣārtho yasya sa mat-paraḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:476: madhusūdanaḥ : tad-arthaṃ bāhyam āsanam uktvādhunā tatra kathaṃ śarīra-dhāraṇam ity ucyate samam iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:477: kāyaḥ śarīra-madhyaṃ sa ca śiraś ca grīvā ca kāya-śiro-grīvaṃ mūlādhārād ārabhya mūrdhānta-paryantaṃ samam avakram acalam akampaṃ dhārayann eka-tattvābhyāsena
GE07bhg4c06u:480: kiṃ ca svaṃ svīyaṃ nāsikāgraṃ saṃprekṣyaiva
GE07bhg4c06u:482: diśaś cānavalokayann antarāntarā diśāṃ cāvalokanam akurvan
GE07bhg4c06u:486: nidāna-nivṛtti-rūpeṇa prakarṣeṇa śānto rāgādi-doṣa-rahita ātmāntaḥkaraṇaṃ yasya sa praśāntātmā
GE07bhg4c06u:494: nirguṇe vā cittaṃ yasya sa mac-citto
GE07bhg4c06u:496: putrādau priye cintanīye sati katham evaṃ syād ata āha mat-paraḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:497: aham eva paramānanda-rūpatvāt paraḥ puruṣārthaḥ priyo yasya sa tathā |
GE07bhg4c06u:498: tad etat preyaḥ putrāt preyo vittāt preyo 'nyasmāt sarvasmād antarataraṃ yad ayam ātmā [BAU 1.4.8] iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:501: yathā-śakti, na tu svecchayā vyuttiṣṭhed ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:502: bhavati kaścid rāgī strī-citto na tu striyam eva paratvenārādhyatvena gṛhṇāti |
GE07bhg4c06u:503: kiṃ tarhi ? rājānaṃ vā devaṃ vā |
GE07bhg4c06u:504: ayaṃ tu mac-citto mat-paraś ca sarvārādhyatvena mām eva manyata iti bhāṣya-kṛtāṃ vyākhyā |
GE07bhg4c06u:507: viśvanāthaḥ : kāyo deha-madhya-bhāgaḥ samam avakram acalaṃ niścalaṃ dhārayan kurvan manaḥ saṃyamya pratyāhṛtya mac-citto māṃ caturbhujaṃ sundarākāraṃ cintayan |
GE07bhg4c06u:509: baladevaḥ : āsane tasminn upaviṣṭasya śarīra-dhāraṇa-vidhim āha samam iti
GE07bhg4c06u:511: kāyaś ca śiraś ca grīvā ca teṣāṃ samāhāraḥ prāṇy-aṅgatvāt |
GE07bhg4c06u:515: dṛḍha-prayatno bhūtvā sva-nāsikāgraṃ samprekṣya sampaśyan mano-laya-vikṣepa-nivṛttaye bhrū-madhya-dṛṣṭiḥ sann ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:529: śrīdharaḥ : yogābhyāsa-phalam āha yuñjann evam iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:532: niyataṃ niruddhaṃ mānasaṃ cittaṃ yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:534: kathambhūtam ? nirvāṇaṃ paramaṃ prāpyaṃ yasyāṃ tām |
GE07bhg4c06u:536: madhusūdanaḥ : evaṃ saṃprajñāta-samādhināsīnasya kiṃ syād ity ucyate yuñjann iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:537: evaṃ raho 'vasthānādi-pūrvokta-niyamenātmānaṃ mano yuñjann abhyāsa-vairāgyābhyāṃ samāhitaṃ kurvan yogī sadā yogābhyāsa-paro
GE07bhg4c06u:538: 'bhāysātiśayena niyataṃ niruddhaṃ mānasaṃ mano yena niyatā niruddhā mānasā mano-vṛtti-rūpā vikārā yeneti vā niyata-mānasaḥ san, śāntiṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:542: mat-svarūpa-paramānanda-rūpāṃ niṣṭhām adhigacchati, na tu sāṃsārikāṇy
GE07bhg4c06u:545: tathā ca tat-tat-samādhi-phalāny uktvāha bhagavān patañjaliḥ -- te samādhāv upasargā vyutthāne siddhayaḥ [YogaS 3.37] iti,
GE07bhg4c06u:549: tathā coddālako devair āmantrito 'pi tatra saṅgam ādaraṃ smayaṃ garvaṃ cākṛtvā devān avajñāya
GE07bhg4c06u:550: aniṣṭa-prasaṅga-nivāraṇāya nirvikalpakam eva samādhim akarod iti vasiṣṭhenopākhyāyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:551: mumukṣubhir heyaś ca samādhiḥ sūtritaḥ patañjalinā --
GE07bhg4c06u:554: saṃśaya-viparyayānadhyavasāya-rahitatvena prajñāyate prakarṣeṇa viśeṣa-rūpeṇa jñāyate bhāvyasya rūpaṃ yena sa samprajñātaḥ samādhir
GE07bhg4c06u:556: bhāvanā hi bhāvyasya viṣayāntara-parihāreṇa cetasi punaḥ punar niveśanam |
GE07bhg4c06u:566: nyag-bhūte citte bhāvyamānasya evotkarṣaṃ iti yāvat |
GE07bhg4c06u:568: yathābhijātasya nirmalasya sphaṭika-maṇes tat-tad-upāśraya-vaśāt tat-tad-rūpāpattir evaṃ nirmalasya cittasya tat-tad-bhāvanīya-vastūparāgāt tat-tad-rūpāpattiḥ
GE07bhg4c06u:570: yadyapi garhītṛ-grahaṇa-grāhyeṣv ity uktaṃ tathāpi bhūmikā-krama-vaśād grāhya-grahaṇa-grahītṛṣv iti boddhavyam |
GE07bhg4c06u:571: yataḥ prathamaṃ grāhya-niṣṭha eva samādhir bhavati tato grahaṇa-niṣṭhas
GE07bhg4c06u:574: tatra yadā sthūlaṃ mahā-bhūtendriyātmaka-ṣoḍaśa-vikāra-rūpaṃ viṣayam ādāya pūrvāparānusandhānena śabdārthollekhena ca bhāvanā kriyate tadā
GE07bhg4c06u:580: deśa-kāla-dharmāvacchedena yadā bhāvanā pravartate tadā sa-vicāraḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:585: tathā ca bhāṣyaṃ vitarkaś cittasya sthūla ālambana ābhogaḥ sūkṣme vicāra iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:589: cic-chakteḥ sukha-prakāśamayasya sattvasya bhāvayamānasyodrekātmānanadaḥ samādhir bhavati
GE07bhg4c06u:590: asminn eva samādhau ye baddha-dhṛtayas tattvāntaraṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:594: tataḥ paraṃ rajas-tamo-leśānabhibhūtaṃ śuddhaṃ sattvam ālambanīkṛtya yā bhāvanā pravartate tasyāṃ grāhyasya sattvasya nyag-bhāvāc citi-śakter udrekāt
GE07bhg4c06u:597: yato yatrāntaḥkaraṇam ahim ity ullekhena viṣayān vedayate so 'haṅkāraḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:600: asminn eva samādhau ye kṛta-paritoṣās te paraṃ puruṣam apaśyantaś cetasaḥ prakṛtau līnatvāt
GE07bhg4c06u:604: ye tu paraṃ puruṣaṃ vivicya bhāvanāyāṃ pravartante teṣām api kevala-puruṣa-viṣayā viveka-khyātir
GE07bhg4c06u:605: grahītṛ-samāpattir api na sāsmitaḥ samādhir vivekenāsmitāyās tyāgāt |
GE07bhg4c06u:606: tatra grahītṛ-bhāna-pūrvakam eva grahaṇa-bhānaṃ tat-pūrvakaṃ ca
GE07bhg4c06u:612: caturtho vitarka-vicārānandair vikalo 'smitā-mātra iti caturavastho 'yaṃ samprajñāta iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:613: evaṃ sa-vitarkaḥ sa-vicāraḥ sānandaḥ sāsmitaś ca samādhir antardhānādi-siddhi-hetutayā
GE07bhg4c06u:618: catur-vidhā hi grāhya-samāpattiḥ sthūla-grāhya-gocarā dvividhā sa-vitarkā
GE07bhg4c06u:622: śabdārtha-jñāna-vikalpa-sambhinnā sthūlārthāvabhāsa-rūpā savitarkā samāpattiḥ sthūla-gocarā savikalpaka-vṛttir ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:628: etayaiva savicārā nirvicārā ca sūkṣma-viṣayā vyākhyātā [YogaS
GE07bhg4c06u:629: 1.44] sūkṣmas tan-mātrādir viṣayo yasyāḥ sā sūkṣma-viṣayā samāpattir dvividhā sa-vicārā nirvicārā ca savikalpaka-nirvikalpaka-bhedena |
GE07bhg4c06u:630: etayaiva savitarkayā nirvitarkayā ca sthūla-viṣayayā samāpattyā vyākhyātā |
GE07bhg4c06u:637: sa-vicārāyā nirvicārāyāś ca samāpatter yat sūkṣma-viṣayatvam uktaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:640: grahitṛ-grahaṇa-samāpattyor api grāhya-samāpattāv evāntar-bhāva ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:641: tathā hi - pārthivasyāṇor gandha-tanmātraṃ sūkṣmo viṣayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:644: nabhasaḥ śabda-tanmātraṃ, teṣām ahaṅkāras tasya liṅga-mātraṃ mahat-tattvaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:646: saptānām api prakṛtīnāṃ pradhāna eva sūkṣmatā-viśrāntes tat-paryantam eva sūkṣma-viṣayatvam
GE07bhg4c06u:647: | yadyapi pradhānād api puruṣaḥ sūkṣmo 'sti tathāpy anvayi-kāraṇatvābhāvāt
GE07bhg4c06u:648: tasya sarvānvayi-kāraṇe pradhāna eva niratiśayaṃ saukṣmyaṃ vyākhyātam |
GE07bhg4c06u:649: puruṣas tu nimitta-kāraṇaṃ sad api nānanvayi-kāraṇatvena sūkṣmatām arhati |
GE07bhg4c06u:650: anvayi-kāraṇatva-vivakṣāyāṃ tu puruṣo 'pi sūkṣmo bhavaty eveti
GE07bhg4c06u:652: tā eva sa-bījaḥ samādhiḥ [YogaS 1.46] tāś catasraḥ samāpattayo grāhyeṇa bījena saha vartanta iti sa-bījaḥ samādhir
GE07bhg4c06u:665: tatra pūrveṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ nirvicārārthatvān nirvicāra-phalenaiva phalavattvam |
GE07bhg4c06u:668: kleśa-vāsanā-rahitasya cittasya bhūtārtha-viṣayaḥ kramānanurodhī sphuṭaḥ prajñālokaḥ prādurbhavati
GE07bhg4c06u:671: bhūmiṣṭhān iva śailasthaḥ sarvān prājño 'nupaśyati || iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:672: ṛtaṃbharā tatra prajñā [YogaS 1.48] tatra tasmin prajñā-prasāde sati
GE07bhg4c06u:673: samāhita-cittasya yogino yā prajñā jāyate sā ṛtam-bharā |
GE07bhg4c06u:674: ṛtaṃ satyam eva bibharti na tatra viparyāsa-gandho 'py astīti yogikyeveyaṃ samākhyā |
GE07bhg4c06u:678: tridhā prakalpayan prajñāṃ labhate yogam uttamam || iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:681: na hi viśeṣeṇa saha kasyacic chabdasya saṅgatir grahītuṃ śakyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:684: na hi viśeṣeṇa saha kasyacid vyāptir grahītuṃ śakyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:685: tasmāc chrutānumāna-viṣayo na viśeṣaḥ kaścid asti |
GE07bhg4c06u:686: na cāsya sūkṣma-vyavahita-viprakṛṣṭasya vastuno loka-pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇam asti |
GE07bhg4c06u:687: kiṃ tu samādhi-prajñā-nirgrāhya eva sa viśeṣo bhavati bhūta-sūkṣma-gato vā
GE07bhg4c06u:691: sūkṣma-vyavahita-prakṛṣṭa-sarva-viśeṣa-viṣayāyāmṛtaṃbharāyām eva prajñāyāṃ yoginā mahān prayatna āstheya ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:692: nanu kṣipta-mūḍha-vikṣiptākhya-vyutthāna-saṃskārāṇām ekāgratāyām api sa-vitarka-nirvitarka-sa-vicāra-janānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ sad-bhāvāt taiś cālyamānasya cittasya kathaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:693: nirvicāra-vaiśāradya-pūrvakādhyātma-prasāda-labhya-rtambharā prajñā pratiṣṭhitā syād ata āha -- taj-jaḥ saṃskāro 'nya-saṃskāra-pratibandhī
GE07bhg4c06u:694: [YogaS 1.50] tayā ṛtambharayā prajñayā janito yaḥ saṃskāraḥ sa
GE07bhg4c06u:695: tattva-viṣayayā prajñayā janitatvena balavattvād anyān vyutthānajān samādhijāṃś ca saṃskārān atattva-viṣaya-prajñā-janitatvena durbalān pratibadhnāti sva-kāryākṣamān karoti nāśyatīti vā |
GE07bhg4c06u:696: teṣāṃ saṃskārāṇām abhibhavāt tat-prabhavāḥ pratyayā na bhavanti |
GE07bhg4c06u:699: tataḥ prajñā-kṛtāḥ saṃskārā iti navo navaḥ saṃskārāśayo vardhate |
GE07bhg4c06u:703: tattva-mātra-viṣaya-samprajñāta-samādhi-prajñā-prabhavaiḥ saṃskāraiḥ pratibandhas teṣāṃ tu saṃskārāṇāṃ pratibandhakābhāvād ekāgra-bhūmāv eva
GE07bhg4c06u:704: sa-bījaḥ samādhiḥ syān na tu nirbījo nirodha-bhūmāv iti tatrāha -- tasyāpi nirodhe sarva-nirodhān nirbījaḥ samādhiḥ [YogaS 1.51] tasya samprajñātasya samādher ekāgra-bhūmijasya |
GE07bhg4c06u:705: api-śabdāt kṣipta-mūḍha-vikṣiptānām api nirodhe yogi-prayatna-viśeṣeṇa vilaye sati sarva-nirodhāt samādheḥ samādhijasya saṃskārasyāpi nirodhān nirbījo nirālambano
GE07bhg4c06u:710: tasya pratyayaḥ kāraṇaṃ paraṃ vairāgyam iti yāvat |
GE07bhg4c06u:711: virāmaś cāsau pratyayaś citta-vṛtti-viśeṣa iti vā |
GE07bhg4c06u:712: tasyābhyāsaḥ paunaḥpunyena cetasi niveśanaṃ tad eva pūrvaṃ kāraṇaṃ yasya sa tathā saṃskāra-mātra-śeṣaḥ
GE07bhg4c06u:713: sarvathā nivṛttiko 'nyaḥ pūrvoktāt sa-bījād vilakṣaṇo nirbījo 'saṃprajñāta-samādhir ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:714: asamprajñātasya hi samādher dvāv upāyāv uktāv abhyāso vairāgyaṃ ca |
GE07bhg4c06u:716: nirālambana-samādhi-hetutvaṃ ghaṭata iti nirālambanaṃ paraṃ vairāgyam eva
GE07bhg4c06u:729: nirbījasya tu samādhes tad api trayaṃ bahiraṅgaṃ paramparayopakāri tasya tu paraṃ vairāgyam evāntaraṅgam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:730: ayam api dvividho bhava-pratyaya upāya-pratyayaś ca |
GE07bhg4c06u:734: ca sāsmitānāṃ daivānāṃ prāg-vyākhyātānāṃ janma-viśeṣād auṣadhi-viśeṣān
GE07bhg4c06u:735: mantra-viśeṣāt tapo-viśeṣād vā yaḥ samādhiḥ sa bhava-pratyayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:736: bhavaḥ saṃsāra ātmānātma-vivekābhāva-rūpaḥ pratyayaḥ kāraṇaṃ yasya sa tathā |
GE07bhg4c06u:743: ātmānātma-viveka-darśināṃ tu yaḥ samādhiḥ sa śraddhā-pūrvakaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:744: śraddhādayaḥ pūrva upāyā yasya sa tathā |
GE07bhg4c06u:748: tataḥ śraddadhānasya vivekārthino vīryam utsāha upajāyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:750: tat-smaraṇāc ca cittam anākulaṃ sat samādhīyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:754: parāc ca vairāgyād bhavaty asamprajñātaḥ samādhir mumukṣūṇām ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:755: pratikṣaṇa-pariṇāmino hi bhāvā ṛte citi-śakteḥ iti nyāyena tasyām api
GE07bhg4c06u:757: taj-janya-saṃskāra-pravāhaś ca bhavaty evety abhipretya saṃskāra-viśeṣa
GE07bhg4c06u:759: tasya ca saṃskārasya prayojanam uktam -- tataḥ praśānta-vāhitā saṃskārāt
GE07bhg4c06u:765: uttarottara-kṣaṇeṣu tv adhikam adhikaṃ śāmyatīti krameṇa śāntir vardhate |
GE07bhg4c06u:770: tadā ca nirindhanāgnivac cittaṃ krameṇopaśāmyad-vyutthāna-samādhi-nirodha-saṃskāraiḥ saha svasyāṃ prakṛtau
GE07bhg4c06u:774: vṛttau pañca-vidhāyām api nivṛttāyāṃ svarūpa-pratiṣṭhaḥ puruṣaḥ śuddhaḥ kevalo mukta ity ucyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:775: tad uktaṃ -- tadā draṣṭuḥ svarūpe 'vasthānam [YogaS 1.3] iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:781: antaḥkaraṇa-vṛtti-sārūpyaṃ prāpnuvan nabhoktāpi bhokteva duḥkhānāṃ bhavati |
GE07bhg4c06u:785: etad eva vivṛttaṃ draṣṭṛ-dṛśyoparaktaṃ cittaṃ sarvārtham [YogaS 4.23] cittam eva draṣṭṛ-dṛśyoparaktaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:786: viṣayi-viṣaya-nirbhāsaṃ cetanācetana-svarūpāpannaṃ viṣayātmakam apy aviṣayātmakam ivācetanam api cetanam iva sphaṭika-maṇi-kalpaṃ sarvārtham ity ucyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:787: tad anena citta-sārūpyeṇa bhrāntāḥ kecit tad eva cetanam ity
GE07bhg4c06u:790: yasya bhogāpavargārthaṃ tat sa eva paraś cetano 'saṃhataḥ puruṣo na tu ghaṭādivat saṃhatya-kāri cittaṃ cetanam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:792: evaṃ yo 'ntaḥ-karaṇa-puruṣayor viśeṣa-darśī tasya yāntaḥ-karaṇe prāg-aviveka-vaśād
GE07bhg4c06u:800: yasya lomaharṣāśru-pātau dṛśyete tatrāpy asti viśeṣa-darśana-bījam
GE07bhg4c06u:803: karma-bījaṃ nāsti tasya mokṣa-mārga-śravaṇe pūrva-pakṣa-yuktiṣu rucir bhavaty aruciś ca siddhānta-yuktiṣu
GE07bhg4c06u:804: tasya ko 'ham āsaṃ katham aham āsam ity ādir ātma-bhāva-bhāvanā svābhāvikī pravartate |
GE07bhg4c06u:807: evaṃ sati kiṃ syād iti tad āha -- tadā viveka-nimnaṃ kaivalya-prāg-bhāraṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:816: asmiṃś ca viveka-vāhini citte ye 'ntarāyās te sa-hetukā nivartanīyā ity āha sūtrābhyām -- tac-chidreṣu pratyayāntarāṇi saṃskārebhyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:818: tasmin viveka-vāhini citte chidreṣv antarāleṣu pratyayāntarāṇi vyutthāna-rūpāṇy ahaṃ mamety
GE07bhg4c06u:820: eṣāṃ ca saṃskārāṇāṃ kleśānām iva hānam uktam |
GE07bhg4c06u:821: yathā kleśā avidyādayo jñānāgninā dagdha-bīja-bhāvā ca punaś citta-bhūmau prarohaṃ prāpnuvanti tathā jñānāgninā dagdha-bīja-bhāvāḥ saṃskārāḥ pratyayāntarāṇi na praroḍhum arhanti |
GE07bhg4c06u:822: jñānāgni-saṃskārās tu yāvac cittam anuśerata iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:823: evaṃ ca pratyayāntarānudayena viveka-vāhini citte sthirībhūte sati
GE07bhg4c06u:826: tatra buddheḥ sāttvike pariṇāme kṛta-saṃyamasya sarveṣāṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:827: guṇa-pariṇāmānāṃ svāmivad ākramaṇaṃ sarvādhiṣṭhātṛtvaṃ teṣām eva ca
GE07bhg4c06u:829: sarva-jñātṛtvaṃ ca viśokā nāma siddhiḥ phalaṃ tad-vairāgyāc ca kaivalyam uktaṃ -- sattva-puruṣānyatā-khyāti-mātrasya
GE07bhg4c06u:832: tad etad ucyate tasmin prasaṅkhyāne saty apy akusīdasya phalam alipsoḥ pratyayāntarāṇām anudaye
GE07bhg4c06u:835: ayaṃ tu paramo dharmo yad yogenātma-darśanam || iti smṛteḥ ||
GE07bhg4c06u:840: dharma-meghāt samādher dharmād vā kleśānāṃ pañca-vidhānām
GE07bhg4c06u:841: avidyāsmitā-rāga-dveṣābhiniveśānāṃ karmaṇāṃ ca kṛṣṇa-śuklakṛṣṇa-śukla-bhedena trividhānām avidyā-mūlānām avidyā-kṣaye
GE07bhg4c06u:845: evaṃ sthite yuñjann eva sadātmānam ity anena samprajñātaḥ samādhir
GE07bhg4c06u:853: yasmād evaṃ mahā-phalo yogas tasmāt taṃ mahatā prayatnena sampādayed ity abhiprāyaḥ
GE07bhg4c06u:854: viśvanāthaḥ : ātmānaṃ mano yuñjan dhyāna-yoga-yuktaṃ kurvan |
GE07bhg4c06u:857: nirvāṇo mokṣa eva paramaḥ prāpyo yasyāṃ mayy eva nirviśeṣa-brahmaṇi samyak sthā sthitir yasyāṃ tāṃ śāntiṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:859: baladevaḥ : evam āsīnasya kiṃ syāt tad āha yuñjann iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:860: yogī sadā pratidinam ātmānaṃ yuñjann arpayan |
GE07bhg4c06u:862: mat-sparśa-pariśuddhatayā niyataṃ niścalaṃ mānasaṃ cittaṃ yasya sa,
GE07bhg4c06u:863: mat-saṃsthāṃ mad-adhīnāṃ nirvāṇa-paramāṃ śāntim adhigacchati labhate |
GE07bhg4c06u:864: tam eva viditvātimṛtyum eti [ŚvetU 3.8] ity ādi śravaṇāt |
GE07bhg4c06u:868: nātyaśnatas tu yogo 'sti na caikāntam anaśnataḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:872: atyantam adhikaṃ bhuñjānasya ekāntam atyantam abhuñjānasyāpi yogaḥ samādhir na bhavati |
GE07bhg4c06u:874: madhusūdanaḥ : evaṃ yogābhyāsa-niṣṭhasyāhārādi-niyamam āha nātyaśanata iti
GE07bhg4c06u:876: yad bhuktaṃ sajjīryati śarīrasya ca kārya-kṣamatāṃ sampādayati
GE07bhg4c06u:877: tad-ātma-saṃmitam annaṃ tad atikramya lobhenādhikam aśnato na yogo 'sti
GE07bhg4c06u:880: anāhārād atyalpāhārād vā rasa-poṣaṇābhāvena śarīrasya kāryākṣamatvāt |
GE07bhg4c06u:881: yad u ha vā ātma-saṃmitam annaṃ tad avati tan na hinasti yad bhūyo hinasti tad yat kanīyo 'nnaṃ na tad avati [ŚatapathaB 9.2.1.2] iti śatapatha-śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:882: tasmād yogī nātma-saṃmitād annād adhikaṃ nyūnaṃ vāśnīyād ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:886: ity ādi yoga-śāstrokta-parimāṇād adhikaṃ nyūnaṃ vāśnato yogo na sampadyata
GE07bhg4c06u:891: nādhmātaḥ kṣudhitaḥ śrānto na ca vyākula-cetanaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:892: yuñjīta yogaṃ rājendra yogī siddhy-artham ātmanaḥ ||
GE07bhg4c06u:893: nātīśīte na caivoṣṇe na dvandve nānilānvite |
GE07bhg4c06u:894: kāleṣv eteṣu yuñjīta na yogaṃ dhyāna-tat-paraḥ || ity ādi ||16||
GE07bhg4c06u:895: viśvanāthaḥ : yogābhyāsa-niṣṭhasya niyamam āha nātyaśanata iti dvyābhyām |
GE07bhg4c06u:899: vāyoḥ saṅcaraṇārthaṃ tu caturtham avaśeṣayet || iti ||16||
GE07bhg4c06u:900: baladevaḥ : yogam abhyasyato bhojanādi-niyamam āha nātīti dvyābhyām |
GE07bhg4c06u:901: atyaśanam anatyaśanaṃ ca, atisvāpo 'tijāgaraś ca, yoga-virodhy-ativihārādi
GE07bhg4c06u:906: śrīdharaḥ : tarhi kathambhūtasya yogo bhavatīti ? ata āha - yuktāhāreti |
GE07bhg4c06u:907: yukto niyata āhāro vihāraś ca gatir yasya |
GE07bhg4c06u:908: karmasu kāryeṣu yuktā niyatā ceṣṭā yasya |
GE07bhg4c06u:917: tathānyeṣv api praṇava-japopaniṣad-āvartanādiṣu karmasu yuktā niyata-kālā
GE07bhg4c06u:919: tathā svapno nidrā avabodho jāgaraṇaṃ tau yuktau
GE07bhg4c06u:923: evaṃ prayanta-viśeṣeṇa sampādito yogaḥ kiṃ-phala iti tatrāha duḥkhaheti |
GE07bhg4c06u:927: ardham aśanasya sa-vyañjanasya tṛtīyam udakasya tu |
GE07bhg4c06u:930: vihārasya niyatatvaṃ yoganān na paraṃ gacched ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c06u:933: vibhāga-trayaṃ kṛtvā prathamānyayor jāgaraṇaṃ madhye svapanam iti
GE07bhg4c06u:936: viśvanāthaḥ : yukto niyata evāhāro bhojanaṃ vihāro gamanaṃ ca yasya tasya
GE07bhg4c06u:937: karmasu vyavahārika-pāramārthika-kṛtyeṣu yuktā niyatā eva ceṣṭā
GE07bhg4c06u:942: ca sarva-duḥkha-nāśako yogo bhavati tasmād yogī tathā tathā vartate ||17||
GE07bhg4c06u:945: niḥspṛhaḥ sarva-kāmebhyo yukta ity ucyate tadā ||18||
GE07bhg4c06u:946: śrīdharaḥ : kadā niṣpanna-yogaḥ puruṣo bhavatīty apekṣāyām āha yadeti |
GE07bhg4c06u:947: viniyataṃ viśeṣeṇa niruddhaṃ sac-cittam ātmany eva yadā niścalaṃ tiṣṭhati |
GE07bhg4c06u:948: kiṃ ca sarva-kāmebhya aihikāmuṣmika-bhogebhyo niḥspṛho vigata-tṛṣṇo
GE07bhg4c06u:951: madhusūdanaḥ : evam ekāgra-bhūmau samprajñātaṃ samādhim abhidhāya
GE07bhg4c06u:952: nirodha-bhūmāv asamprajñātaṃ samādhiṃ vaktum upakramate yadeti |
GE07bhg4c06u:953: yadā yasmin kāle para-vairāgya-vaśād viniyataṃ viśeṣeṇa niyataṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:956: sarvato-niruddha-vṛttikatvād ātmany eva pratyak citi anātmānuparakte vṛtti-rāhitye 'pi svataḥ-siddhasyātmākārasya vārayitum aśakyatvāc citer
GE07bhg4c06u:957: eva prādhānyān nyag-bhūtaṃ sad avatiṣṭhate niścalaṃ bhavati |
GE07bhg4c06u:958: tadā tasmin sarva-vṛtti-nirodha-kāle yuktaḥ samāhita ity ucyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:962: dṛṣṭādṛṣṭa-viṣayebhyaḥ kāmebhyaḥ spṛhā tṛṣṇā yasyeti paraṃ vairāgyam
GE07bhg4c06u:965: viśvanāthaḥ :yogī niṣpanna-yogaḥ kadā bhaved ity ākāṅkṣāyām āha yadeti |
GE07bhg4c06u:966: viniyataṃ niruddhaṃ cittam ātmani svasminn evāvatiṣṭhate niścalī-bhavatīty
GE07bhg4c06u:968: baladevaḥ : yogī niṣpanna-yogaḥ kadā syād ity apekṣāyām āha yadeti |
GE07bhg4c06u:969: yogam abhyasyato yoginaś cittam yadā viniyataṃ niruddhaṃ sadātmany eva svasminn evāvasthitaṃ sthiraṃ bhavati, tad-ātmetara-sarva-spṛhā-śūnyo yukto
GE07bhg4c06u:972: yathā dīpo nivāta-stho neṅgate sopamā smṛtā |
GE07bhg4c06u:973: yogino yata- cittasya yuñjato yogam ātmanaḥ ||19||
GE07bhg4c06u:975: vāta-śūnye deśe sthito dīpo yathā neṅgate na vicalati |
GE07bhg4c06u:978: yataṃ niyataṃ cittaṃ yasya tasya niṣkampatayā prakāśakatayā cācañcalaṃ tac cittaṃ tadvat tiṣṭhatīty arthaḥ ||19||
GE07bhg4c06u:979: madhusūdanaḥ : samādhau nivṛttikasya cittasyopamānam āha yatheti |
GE07bhg4c06u:980: dīpa-calana-hetunā vātena rahite deśe sthito dīpo yathā
GE07bhg4c06u:981: calana-hetv-abhāvān neṅgate na calati, sopamā smṛtā sa dṛṣṭāntaś cintito yogajñaiḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:984: asamprajñāta-samādhi-rūpaṃ yogaṃ nirodha-bhūmau yuñjato 'nutiṣṭhato ya ātmāntaḥkaraṇaṃ tasya niścalatayā sattvodrekeṇa prakāśakatayā ca niścalo dīpo dṛṣṭānta ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:985: ātmano yogaṃ yuñjata iti vyākhyāne dārṣṭāntikālābhaḥ sarvāvasthasyāpi cittasya sarvadātmākāratayātma-pada-vaiyarthyaṃ ca |
GE07bhg4c06u:986: na hi yogenātmākāratā cittasya sampādyate, kintu svata evātmākārasya sato 'nātmākāratā
GE07bhg4c06u:989: yata-cittasyeti bhāva-paro nirdeśaḥ karma-dhārayo vā yatasya cittasyety
GE07bhg4c06u:991: viśvanāthaḥ : nivāta-stho nirvāta-deśa-sthito dīpo neṅgate na calati yaḥ sa eva dīpa upamā yathā yathāvad ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:994: kasyopamā ity ata āha yogina iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:995: baladevaḥ : tadā yogī kīdṛśo bhavatīty apekṣāyām āha yatheti |
GE07bhg4c06u:996: nirvāta-deśa-stho dīpo neṅgate na calati niścalaḥ sa-prabhas tiṣṭhati sa dīpo yathā yathāvad upamā yogajñaiḥ smṛtā cintitā |
GE07bhg4c06u:998: lope cet pāda-pūraṇam [Pāṇ 6.1.134] iti sūtrāt sandhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1008: sukham ātyantikaṃ yat tad buddhi-grāhyam atīndriyam |
GE07bhg4c06u:1009: vetti yatra na caivāyaṃ sthitaś calati tattvataḥ ||21||
GE07bhg4c06u:1010: yaṃ labdhvā cāparaṃ lābhaṃ manyate nādhikaṃ tataḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1011: yasmin sthito na duḥkhena guruṇāpi vicālyate ||22||
GE07bhg4c06u:1014: śrīdharaḥ : yaṃ saṃnyāsam iti prāhur yogaṃ taṃ viddhi pāṇḍava [Gītā 6.2]
GE07bhg4c06u:1018: tatra mukhyo yogaḥ ka ity apekṣāyāṃ samādhim eva svarūpataḥ phalataś ca lakṣayan sa eva mukhyo yoga ity āha yatreti sārdhais tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1020: yogābhyāsena niruddhaṃ cittam uparataṃ bhavatīti yogasya svarūpa-lakṣaṇam
GE07bhg4c06u:1022: tathā ca pātañjalaṃ sūtram yogaś citta-vṛtti-nirodhaḥ [YogaS 1.2]
GE07bhg4c06u:1027: ātmanā śuddhena manasā ātmānam eva paśyati na tu dehādi |
GE07bhg4c06u:1030: yatrety ādīnāṃ yac-chandānāṃ taṃ yoga-saṃjñitaṃ vidyād iti caturthena ślokenānvayaḥ ||20|
GE07bhg4c06u:1031: ātmany eva toṣe hetum āha sukham iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1032: yatra yasminn avasthā-viśeṣe yat tat kim api niratiśayam ātyantikaṃ nityaṃ sukhaṃ vetti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1033: nanu tadā viṣayendriya-sambandhābhāvāt kutaḥ sukhaṃ syāt ? tatrāha atīndriyaṃ viṣayendriya-sambandhātītam
GE07bhg4c06u:1035: ataeva ca yatra sthitaḥ saṃs tattvata ātma-svarūpān naiva calati ||21||
GE07bhg4c06u:1040: yasmiṃś ca sthito mahatāpi śītoṣṇādi-duḥkhena na vicālyate nābhibhūyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:1045: duḥkha-śabdena duḥkha-miśritaṃ vaiṣayikaṃ sukham api gṛhyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:1046: duḥkhasya saṃyogena saṃsparśa-mātreṇāpi viyogo yasmin tam
GE07bhg4c06u:1049: yad vā duḥkha-saṃyogena viyoga eva śūre
GE07bhg4c06u:1053: yasmād evaṃ mahā-phalo yogas tasmāt sa eva yatnato 'bhyasanīya ity āha tam
GE07bhg4c06u:1059: madhusūdanaḥ : evaṃ sāmānyena samādhim uktvā nirodha-samādhiṃ vistareṇa vivarītum ārambhate yatreti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1062: ekāgratāṃ tyaktvā nirindhanāgnivad upaśāmyan nirvṛttikatayā sarva-vṛtti-nirodha-rūpeṇa pariṇataṃ bhavati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1063: yatra ca yasmiṃś ca pariṇāme sati ātmanā rajas-tamo
GE07bhg4c06u:1066: vedānta-pramāṇajayā vṛttyā sākṣātkurvann ātmany eva paramānanda-ghane
GE07bhg4c06u:1067: tuṣyati, na dehendriya-saṃghāte, na vā tad-bhogye 'nyatra |
GE07bhg4c06u:1068: paramātma-darśane saty atuṣṭi-hetv-abhāvāt tuṣyaty eveti vā |
GE07bhg4c06u:1072: yatra kāla iti tu vyākhyānam asādhu tac-chabdānanvayāt
GE07bhg4c06u:1073: ātmany eva toṣe hetum āha sukham iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1077: rajas-tamo-mala-rahitayā sattva-mātra-vāhinyā grāhyaṃ sukhaṃ yogī vetti anubhavati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1078: yatra ca sthito 'yaṃ vidvāṃs tattvata ātma-svarūpān naiva calati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1079: taṃ yoga-saṃjñitaṃ vidyād iti pareṇānvayaḥ samānaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1083: buddhi-grāhyam iti sauṣupta-sukha-vyāvṛttiḥ suṣuptau buddher līnatvāt |
GE07bhg4c06u:1085: tad uktaṃ gauḍa-pādaiḥ - līyate tu suṣuptau tan nigṛhītaṃ na līyate iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1087: samādhi-nirdhūta-malasya cetaso niveśitasyātmani yat sukhaṃ bhavet |
GE07bhg4c06u:1088: na śakyate varṇayituṃ girā tadā yad etad antaḥ-karaṇena gṛhyate || iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1090: vṛttyā tu sukhāsvādanaṃ gauḍācāryais tatra pratiṣiddham - nāsvādayet sukhaṃ tatra niḥsaṅgaṃ prajñayā bhavet iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1091: mahad idaṃ samādhau sukham anubhavāmīti sa-vikalpa-vṛtti-rūpā prajñā sukhāsvādaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1094: ataevaitādṛśyā prajñayā saha saṅgaṃ parityajet tāṃ nirundhyād ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1097: svasthaṃ śāntaṃ sa-nirvāṇa-kathyaṃ sukham uttamam iti spaṣṭaṃ caitad upariṣṭhāt kariṣyate
GE07bhg4c06u:1098: yatra na caivāyaṃ sthitaś calati tattvata ity uktam upapādayati yaṃ labdhveti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1102: kṛtaṃ kṛtyaṃ prāptaṃ prāpaṇīyam ity ātma-lābhāc ca paraṃ vidyate iti smṛteḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1105: śīta-vāta-maśakādy-upadrava-nivāraṇārtham api tan nāstīty āha yasmin paramātma-sukha-maye nirvṛttika-cittāvasthā-viśeṣe sthito yogī guruṇā
GE07bhg4c06u:1106: mahatā śastra-nipātādi-nimittena mahatāpi duḥkhena na vicālyate kim uta
GE07bhg4c06u:1108: yatroparamata ity ārabhya bahubhir viśeṣaṇair yo nivṛttikaḥ paramānandābhivyañjakaś cittāvasthā-viśeṣa uktas taṃ citta-vṛtti-nirodhaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:1109: citta-vṛtti-maya-sarva-duḥkha-virodhitvena duḥkha-viyogam eva santaṃ yoga-saṃjñitaṃ viyoga-śabdārtham api virodhi-lakṣaṇayā yoga-śabda-vācyaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:1110: vidyāj jānīyāc ca tu yoga-śabdānurodhāt kaṃcit sambandhaṃ pratipadyetety
GE07bhg4c06u:1112: tathā ca bhagavān patañjalir asūtrayat yogaś citta-vṛtti-nirodhaḥ
GE07bhg4c06u:1114: yogo bhavati duḥkhahā [6.17] iti yat prāg uktaṃ tad etad
GE07bhg4c06u:1116: evaṃ-bhūte yoge niścayānirvedayoḥ sādhanatva-vidhānāyāha sa niścayeneti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1121: etāvatāpi kālena yogo na siddhaḥ kim ataḥ paraṃ kaṣṭam ity anutāpo nirvedas tad-rahitena cetasā
GE07bhg4c06u:1122: iha janmani janmāntare vā setsyati kiṃ tvarayety evaṃ dhairyam uktena manasety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1126: manaso nigrahas tadvad bhaved aparikhedataḥ || iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1127: utseka utsecanaṃ śoṣaṇādhvasyāyena jaloddharaṇam iti yāvat |
GE07bhg4c06u:1132: sa ca samudraṃ śoṣayiṣāmy eveti pravṛttaḥ sva-mukhāgreṇaikaikaṃ jala-bindum upari pracikṣepa
GE07bhg4c06u:1133: tadā ca bahubhiḥ pakṣibhir bandhu-vargair vāryamāṇo 'pi naivopararāma |
GE07bhg4c06u:1134: yadṛcchayā ca tatrāgatena nāradena nivārito 'py asmin janmani janmāntare
GE07bhg4c06u:1135: vā yena kenāpy upāyena samudraṃ śoṣayiṣyāmy eveti pratijajñe |
GE07bhg4c06u:1136: tataś ca daivānukūlyāt kṛpālur nārado garuḍaṃ tat-sāhāyyāya preṣayāmāsa |
GE07bhg4c06u:1140: śuṣyan samudro bhītas tāny aṇḍāni tasmai pakṣiṇe pradadāv iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1141: evam akhedena mano-nirodhe parama-dharme pravartamānaṃ yoginam īśvaro
GE07bhg4c06u:1143: tataś ca pakṣiṇa iva tasyābhimataṃ sidhyatīti bhāvaḥ ||23||
GE07bhg4c06u:1144: viśvanāthaḥ : nātyaśnatas tu yogo 'stīty ādau yoga-śabdena samādhir uktaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1150: yatra samādhau sati cittam uparamate vastu-mātram eva na spṛśatīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1152: | tathā ca pātañjala-sūtram - yogaś citta-vṛtti-nirodhaḥ [YogaS 1.2] iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1159: ataeva yatra sthitaḥ san tattvata ātma-svarūpān naiva calati, ataeva yaṃ lābhaṃ labdhvā tataḥ sakāśād aparaṃ lābham adhikaṃ na manyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:1160: duḥkhasya saṃyogena sparśa-mātreṇāpi viyogo yasmin taṃ yoga-saṃjñtaṃ yoga-saṃjñāṃ prāptaṃ samādhiṃ vidyāt |
GE07bhg4c06u:1161: yadyapi śīghraṃ na sidhyati tad apy ayaṃ me yogaḥ saṃsetsyaty eveti yo niścayas tena |
GE07bhg4c06u:1163: kim ataḥ paraṃ kaṣṭenety anutāpo nirvedas tad-rahitena cetasā |
GE07bhg4c06u:1165: sidhyatu, kiṃ me tvarayeti dhairya-yuktena manasety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1168: manaso nigrahas tadvad bhaved aparikhedataḥ || iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1174: sa ca samudraṃ śoṣayiṣāmīty eveti pratijñāya
GE07bhg4c06u:1176: taṃ ca bahubhiḥ pakṣibhir bandhubhir yuktyā vāryamāṇo 'pi naivopararāma |
GE07bhg4c06u:1177: yadṛcchayā ca tatrāgatena nāradena nivārito 'py asmin janmani janmāntare vā samudraṃ śoṣayiṣyāmy eveti tad-agre 'pi punaḥ pratijajñe |
GE07bhg4c06u:1178: tataś ca daivānukūlyāt kṛpālur nārado garuḍaṃ tat-sāhāyyāya preṣayāmāsa |
GE07bhg4c06u:1182: garuḍa-pakṣa-vātena śuṣyan samudro 'tibhītas tāny aṇḍāni tasmai pakṣiṇe dadāv iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1183: evam eva śāstra-vacanāstikyena yoge jñāne bhaktau vā pravartamānam utsāhavantam adhyavasāyinaṃ janaṃ bhagavān evānugṛhṇātīti niścetavyam
GE07bhg4c06u:1184: baladevaḥ : nātyaśnata ity ādau yoga-śabdenoktaṃ samādhiṃ svarūpataḥ phalataś ca lakṣayati yatrety-ādi-sārdha-trayeṇa |
GE07bhg4c06u:1185: yac-chabdānāṃ taṃ vidyād yoga-saṃjñitam ity uttareṇānvayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1186: yogaysa sevayābhyāsena niruddhaṃ nivṛttetara-vṛttikaṃ cittaṃ yatroparamate mahat sukham etad
GE07bhg4c06u:1188: na tu dehādi paśyan viṣayeṣv iti citta-vṛtti-nirodhena
GE07bhg4c06u:1191: yatra samādhau yat tat prasiddham ātyantikaṃ nityaṃ sukhaṃ vetty anubhavati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1193: ataeva yatra sthitas tattvata ātma-svarūpān naiva calati, yaṃ yogaṃ labdhvaiva tato 'paraṃ lābham adhikaṃ na manyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:1194: guruṇā guṇavat putra-vicchedādinā na vicāyate tam iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1195: duḥkha-saṃyogasya viyogaḥ pradhvaṃso yatra taṃ yoga-saṃjñtaṃ samādhim ||20-23||
GE07bhg4c06u:1201: yoga-pratikūlān sarvān kāmān aśeṣataḥ sa-vāsanāṃs tyaktvā manasaiva viṣaya-doṣa-darśinā sarvataḥ prasarantam indriya-samūhaṃ viśeṣeṇa niyamya |
GE07bhg4c06u:1203: madhusūdanaḥ : kiṃ ca kṛtvā yogo 'bhyasnīyaḥ ? saṅkalpo duṣṭeṣv api
GE07bhg4c06u:1205: tasmāc ca saṅkalpād idaṃ me syād idaṃ me syād ity evaṃ-rūpāḥ kāmāḥ prabhavanti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1210: brahma-loka-paryantān aśeṣato niravaśeṣān savāsanāṃs tyaktvā, ataeva
GE07bhg4c06u:1212: manasaivendriya-prāptaṃ cakṣur-ādi-karaṇa-samūhaṃ viniyamya samantataḥ sarvebhyo viṣayebhyaḥ pratyāhṛtya śanaiḥ śanair uparamed ity anvayaḥ ||24||
GE07bhg4c06u:1213: viśvanāthaḥ : etādṛśa-yogābhyāse pravṛttasya prāthamikaṃ kṛtyam antyaṃ ca kṛtyam āha saṅkalpeti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c06u:1215: na kiṃcid api cintayed ity antyaṃ kṛtyam ||24-25||
GE07bhg4c06u:1216: baladevaḥ : sa yogaḥ prārambha-daśāyāṃ niścayena prayatne kṛte saṃsetsyaty evety adhyavasāyena yoktavyo 'nuṣṭheyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1219: etādṛśaṃ yogam ārabhamāṇasya prāthamikaṃ kṛtyam āha saṅkalpeti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1220: saṅkalpāt prabhavo yeṣāṃ tān yoga-virodhinaḥ kāmān viṣayān aśeṣataḥ sa-vāsanāṃs
GE07bhg4c06u:1226: ātma-saṃsthaṃ manaḥ kṛtvā na kiṃcid api cintayet ||25||
GE07bhg4c06u:1227: śrīdharaḥ : yadi tu prāktana-karma-saṃskāreṇa mano vicalet tarhi dhāraṇayā sthirīkuryād ity āha śanair iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1230: ātma-saṃstham ātmany eva samyak sthitaṃ niścalaṃ manaḥ kṛtvoparamet |
GE07bhg4c06u:1233: uparama-svarūpam āha na kiṃcid api cintayet |
GE07bhg4c06u:1237: dhṛti-dhairyam akhinnatā tayā gṛhītā yā buddhir avaśya-kartavyatā-niścaya-rūpā tayā yadā kadācid avaśyaṃ bhaviṣyaty eva
GE07bhg4c06u:1238: yogaḥ kiṃ tvarayety evaṃ-rūpayā śanaiḥ śanair gurūpadiṣṭa-mārgeṇa mano nirundhyāt |
GE07bhg4c06u:1241: yacched vāṅ-manasī prājñas tad yacchej jñāna ātmani |
GE07bhg4c06u:1242: jñānam ātmani mahati niyacchet tad yacchec chānta ātmani || [KaṭhU 1.3.13] iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1243: vāg iti vācaṃ laukikīṃ vaidikīṃ ca manasi vyāpāravati niyacchet |
GE07bhg4c06u:1244: nānudhyāyād bahūn śabdān vāco viglāpanaṃ hi tat [BAU 4.4.21] iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1249: nana-vidha-vikalpa-sādhanaṃ karaṇaṃ jñāne jānātīti jñānam iti vyutpattyā
GE07bhg4c06u:1253: tac ca jñānaṃ jñātṛtvopādhim ahaṅkāram ātmani mahati mahat-tattve sarva-vyāpake niyacchet
GE07bhg4c06u:1254: dvividho hy ahaṅkāro viśeṣa-rūpaḥ sāmānya-rūpaś ceti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1255: ayam aham etasya putra ity evaṃ vyaktam abhimanyamāno viśeṣa-rūpo vyaṣṭy-ahaṅkāraḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1258: sa ca hiraṇyagarbho mahān ātmeti ca sarvānusyūtatvād ucyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:1259: tābhyām ahaṅkārābhyāṃ vivikto nirupādhikaḥ śāntātmā sarvāntaś cid-eka-rasas tasmin mahāntam
GE07bhg4c06u:1262: tato nirupādhikas tvaṃ-pada-lakṣyaḥ śuddha ātmā sākṣātkṛtau bhavati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1263: śuddhe hi cid-eka-rase pratyag-ātmani jaḍa-śakti-rūpam anirvācyam avyaktaṃ prakṛtir upādhiḥ
GE07bhg4c06u:1264: sā ca prathamaṃ sāmānyāhaṅkāra-rūpaṃ mahat tattvaṃ nāma
GE07bhg4c06u:1270: indriyebhyaḥ parā hy arthā arthebhyaś ca paraṃ manaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1271: manasas tu parā buddhir buddher ātmā mahān paraḥ ||
GE07bhg4c06u:1273: puruṣān na paraṃ kiṃcit sā kāṣṭhā sā parā gatiḥ || [KaṭhU 1.3.10-1] iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1274: tatra gavādiṣv iva vāṅ-nirodhaḥ prathamā bhūmiḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1277: suṣuptāv iva mahat-tattva-śāntātmanor madhye mahat-tattvopādānam avyākṛtākhyaṃ tattvaṃ śrutyodāhāri, tathāpi tatra mahat-tattvasya niyamanaṃ nābhyadhāyi |
GE07bhg4c06u:1280: puruṣa-prayatnam antareṇa svata eva siddhatvāt tattva-darśanānupayogitvāc
GE07bhg4c06u:1282: dṛśyate tvam agrayā buddhyā sūkṣmayā sūkṣma-darśibhiḥ iti pūrvam abhidhāya sūkṣmatva-siddhaye nirodha-samādher abhidhānāt |
GE07bhg4c06u:1283: sa ca tattva-didṛkṣor darśana-sādhanatvena dṛṣṭa-tattvasya ca
GE07bhg4c06u:1285: nanu śāntātmany avaruddhasya cittasya vṛtti-rahitatvena suṣuptivan na darśana-hetutvam iti cet, na |
GE07bhg4c06u:1290: yathā ghaṭa utpadyamānaḥ svato viyat-pūrṇaṃ evotpadyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:1291: jala-taṇḍulādi-pūraṇaṃ tūtpanne ghaṭe paścāt puruṣa-prayatnena bhavati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1292: tatra jalādau niḥsārite 'pi viyan-niḥsārayituṃ na śakyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:1294: 'py antarviyad avatiṣṭhata eva tathā cittam utpadyamānaṃ caitanya-pūrṇam
GE07bhg4c06u:1305: tad etad āha ātma-saṃsthaṃ manaḥ kṛtvā na kiṃcid api cintayed iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1306: ātmani nirupādhike pratīci saṃsthā samāptir yasya
GE07bhg4c06u:1309: viveka-buddhyā sampādyāsaṃprajñāta-samādhi-sthaḥ san kiṃcid api anātmānam ātmānaṃ vā na cintayet, na vṛttyā viṣayīkuryāt |
GE07bhg4c06u:1312: asamprajñāta-samādhi-sthairyāya kām api citta-vṛttiṃ notpādayed ity arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c06u:1314: baladevaḥ : antimaṃ kṛtyam āha dhṛti-gṛhītayā dhāraṇāvaśīkṛtyā buddhyā mana ātma-saṃsthaṃ kṛtvātmānaṃ dhyātvā samādhāv uparameta tiṣṭhet |
GE07bhg4c06u:1317: etac ca śanaiḥ śanair abhyāsa-krameṇa, na tu haṭhena ||25||
GE07bhg4c06u:1319: yato yato niścarati manaś cañcalam asthiram |
GE07bhg4c06u:1320: tatas tato niyamyaitad ātmany eva vaśaṃ nayet ||26||
GE07bhg4c06u:1321: śrīdharaḥ : evam api rajo-guṇa-vaśād yadi manaḥ pracalet tarhi punaḥ pratyāhāreṇa vaśīkuryād ity āha yato yata iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1322: svabhāvataś cañcalaṃ dhāryamāṇam apy asthiraṃ mano yaṃ yaṃ viṣayaṃ prati nirgacchati, tatas tataḥ pratyāhṛtyātmany eva sthiraṃ kuryāt ||26||
GE07bhg4c06u:1323: madhusūdanaḥ : evaṃ nirodha-samādhiṃ kurvan yogī śabdādīnāṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:1324: citta-vikṣepa-hetūnāṃ madhye yato yato yasmād yasmān nimittāc chabdāder viṣayād rāga-dveṣādeś ca cañcalaṃ vikṣepābhimukhaṃ san mano niścarati
GE07bhg4c06u:1325: vikṣiptaṃ sad viṣayābhimukhīṃ pramāṇa-viparyaya-vikalpa-smṛtīnām anyatamām api samādhi-virodhinīṃ vṛttim utpādayati, tathā laya-hetūnāṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:1326: nidrāśeṣa-bahv-aśana-śramādīnāṃ madhye yato yato nimittād asthiraṃ layābhimukhaṃ san mano niścarati līnaṃ sat samādhi-virodhinīṃ nidrākhyāṃ vṛttim utpādayati, tatas tato vikṣepa-nimittāl laya-nimittāc ca niyamyaitan mano nirvṛttikaṃ kṛtvātmany eva sva-prakāśa-paramānanda-ghane
GE07bhg4c06u:1328: yathā na vikṣipyeta na vā līyeteti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1333: suprasannaṃ laye caiva yathā kāmo layas tathā ||
GE07bhg4c06u:1335: ajaṃ sarvam anusmṛtya jātaṃ naiva tu paśyati ||
GE07bhg4c06u:1336: laye sambodhayec cittaṃ vikṣiptaṃ śamayet punaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1338: nāsvādayet sukhaṃ tatra niḥsaṅgaḥ prajñayā bhavet |
GE07bhg4c06u:1340: yadā na līyate cittaṃ na ca vikṣipyate punaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1341: aniṅganam anābhāsaṃ niṣpannaṃ brahma tat tadā || iti pañcabhiḥ ślokaiḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1343: pramāṇa-viparyaya-vikalpa-smṛtīnām anyatamayāpi vṛttyā pariṇataṃ mano nigṛhṇīyān nirundhyād ātmany evety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1346: tathā līyate 'sminn iti layaḥ suṣuptaṃ tasmin suprasannam āyāsa-varjitam api mano nigṛhṇīyād eva |
GE07bhg4c06u:1347: suprasannaṃ cet kuto nigṛhyate ? tatrāha - yathā kāmo viṣaya-gocara-pramāṇādi-vṛtty-utpādanena samādhi-virodhī tathā layo 'pi
GE07bhg4c06u:1350: ataḥ kāmādi-kṛta-vikṣepād iva śramādi-kṛta-layād api mano niroddhavyam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1351: upāyena nigṛhṇīyāt kena ? ity ucyate sarvaṃ dvaitam avidyā-vijṛmbhitam
GE07bhg4c06u:1352: alpaṃ duḥkham evety anusmṛtya -- yo vai bhūmā tat sukhaṃ, nālpe sukham asti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1353: [ChāU 7.23.1] atha yad alpaṃ tan martyaṃ [ChāU 7.23.1] tad duḥkham iti śruty-arthaṃ gurūpadeśād anu paścāt paryālocya kāmāṃś cintyamānāvasthān viṣayān bhogān bhujyamānāvasthāṃś ca viṣayān nivartayet
GE07bhg4c06u:1355: kāmaś ca bhogaś ca kāma-bhogaṃ tasmān mano nivartayed iti vā |
GE07bhg4c06u:1357: dvaita-vismaraṇaṃ tu paramopāya ity āha ajaṃ brahma sarvaṃ na tato 'tiriktaṃ kiṃcid astīti śāstrācāryopadeśād anantaram anusmṛtya tad-viparītaṃ dvaita-jātaṃ na paśyaty eva |
GE07bhg4c06u:1367: evaṃ punaḥ punar abhyasyato layāt sambodhitaṃ viṣayebhyaś ca vyāvartitam |
GE07bhg4c06u:1368: nāpi samaprāptam antarālāvasthaṃ cittaṃ stabdhībhūtaṃ, sa-kaṣāyaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:1370: yuktaṃ vijānīyāt samāhitāc cittād vivekena jānīyāt |
GE07bhg4c06u:1371: tataś ca nedaṃ samāhitam ity avagamya laya-vikṣepābhyām iva kaṣāyād api
GE07bhg4c06u:1373: tataś ca laya-vikṣepa-kaṣāyeṣu parihṛteṣu pariśeṣāc cittena samaṃ brahma prāpyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:1375: kaṣāya-laya-bhrāntyā na cālayet, viṣayābhimukhaṃ na kuryāt |
GE07bhg4c06u:1377: dhṛti-gṛhītayā buddhyā laya-kaṣāya-prāpter vivicya tasyām eva sama-prāptāv
GE07bhg4c06u:1380: etāvantaṃ kālam ahaṃ sukhīti sukhāsvāda-rūpāṃ vṛttiṃ na kuryāt samādhi-bhaṅga-prasaṅgāt iti prāg eva kṛta-vyākhyānam |
GE07bhg4c06u:1381: prajñayā yad upalabhyate sukhaṃ tad apy avidyā-parikalpitaṃ mṛṣaivety
GE07bhg4c06u:1383: athavā prajñayā sa-vikalpa-sukhākāra-vṛtti-rūpayā saha saṅgaṃ parityajet |
GE07bhg4c06u:1384: na tu svarūpa-sukham api nirvṛttikena cittena nānubhavet
GE07bhg4c06u:1386: evaṃ sarvato nivartya niścalaṃ prayatna-vaśena kṛtaṃ cittaṃ svabhāva-cāñcalyād
GE07bhg4c06u:1387: viṣayābhimukhatayā niścarad bahir nirgacchad ekīkuryāt prayatnataḥ,
GE07bhg4c06u:1389: sama-prāptaṃ cittaṃ kīdṛśam ? ity ucyate yadā na līyate nāpi
GE07bhg4c06u:1391: | na ca vikṣipyate punaḥ, na śabdādy-ākāra-vṛttim anubhavati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1392: nāpi sukham āsvādayati, rājasatva-sāmyena sukhāsvādasyāpi vikṣepa-śabdenopalakṣaṇāt |
GE07bhg4c06u:1395: vikṣepa-sukhāsvādābhyāṃ ca rahitam aniṅganam iṅganaṃ calanaṃ sa-vāta-pradīpaval layābhimukhya-rūpaṃ tad-rahitaṃ nivāta-pradīpa-kalpam |
GE07bhg4c06u:1396: anābhāsaṃ na kenacid viṣayākāreṇābhāsata ity etat |
GE07bhg4c06u:1399: yadaivaṃ doṣa-catuṣṭaya-rahitaṃ cittaṃ bhavati tadā tac cittaṃ brahma niṣpannaṃ samaṃ brahma prāptaṃ bhavatīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1402: buddhiś ca na viceṣṭeta tām āhuḥ paramāṃ gatim ||
GE07bhg4c06u:1403: tāṃ yogam iti manyante sthirām indriya-dhāraṇām |
GE07bhg4c06u:1404: apramattas tadā bhavati yogo hi prabhavāpyayau || [KaṭhU 2.3.11-2] iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1405: etan-mūlakam eva ca yogaś citta-vṛtti-nirodhaḥ [YogaS 1.2] iti sūtram |
GE07bhg4c06u:1406: tasmād yuktaṃ tatas tato niyamyaitad ātmany evaṃ vaśaṃ nayed iti ||27||
GE07bhg4c06u:1407: viśvanāthaḥ : yadi ca prāktana-doṣodgama-vaśād rajo-guṇa-spṛṣṭaṃ manaś cañcalaṃ syāt, tadā punar yogam abhyased ity āha yato yata iti ||26||
GE07bhg4c06u:1408: baladevaḥ : yadi kadācit prāktana-sūkṣma-doṣān manaḥ pracalet tadā tat pratyāhared ity āha yata iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1409: yaṃ yaṃ viṣayaṃ prati mano nirgacchati,
GE07bhg4c06u:1410: tatas tata etan mano niyamya pratyāhṛtyātmany eva
GE07bhg4c06u:1413: praśānta-manasaṃ hy enaṃ yoginaṃ sukham uttamam |
GE07bhg4c06u:1415: śrīdharaḥ : evaṃ pratyāhārādibhiḥ punaḥ punar mano vaśīkurvan
GE07bhg4c06u:1416: rajo-guṇa-kṣaye sati yoga-sukhaṃ prāpnotīty āha praśānteti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1419: ataeva praśāntaṃ mano yasya tam enaṃ niṣkalmaṣam brahmatvaṃ prāptaṃ yoginaṃ uttamam sukhaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:1421: madhusūdanaḥ : evaṃ yogābhyāsa-balād ātmany eva yoginaḥ praśāmyati manaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1424: saṃskāra-mātra-śeṣaṃ mano yasya taṃ praśānta-manasaṃ vṛtti-śūnyatayā
GE07bhg4c06u:1428: śāntaṃ vikṣepakaṃ rajo yasya taṃ vikṣepa-śūnyam |
GE07bhg4c06u:1429: tathā na vidyate kalmaṣam laya-hetus tamo yasya tam akalmaṣam laya-śūnyam |
GE07bhg4c06u:1432: brahma-bhūtaṃ brahmaiva sarvam iti niścayena samaṃ brahma prāptaṃ jīvan-muktam enaṃ yoginam
GE07bhg4c06u:1435: manas tad-vṛttyor abhāve suṣuptau svarūpa-sukhāvirbhāva-prasiddhiṃ dyotayati hi-śabdaḥ
GE07bhg4c06u:1436: tathā ca prāg-vyākhyātaṃ sukham ātyantikaṃ yat tad ity atra ||27||
GE07bhg4c06u:1437: viśvanāthaḥ : tataś ca pūrvavad eva tasya samādhisukhaṃ syād ity āha
GE07bhg4c06u:1440: baladevaḥ : evaṃ prayatamānasya pūrvavad eva samādhi-sukhaṃ syād ity āha
GE07bhg4c06u:1442: praśāntam ātmany acalaṃ mano yasya tam |
GE07bhg4c06u:1448: ātmānubhava-rūpaṃ mahat sukhaṃ kartā svayam evopaiti ||27||
GE07bhg4c06u:1452: śrīdharaḥ : tataś ca kṛtārtho bhavatīty āha yuñjann iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1453: evam anena prakāreṇa sarvadātmānaṃ mano yuñjan vaśīkurvan |
GE07bhg4c06u:1459: madhusūdanaḥ : uktaṃ sukhaṃ yoginaḥ sphuṭīkaroti yuñjann iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1461: manasaivendriya-grāmam ity ādy-ukta-krameṇātmānaṃ manaḥ sadā yuñjan
GE07bhg4c06u:1462: samādadhad yogī yogena nitya-sambandhī vigata-kalmaṣo vigata-malaḥ
GE07bhg4c06u:1465: brahmaṇaḥ sparśas tādātmyaṃ yasmiṃs tad-viṣayāsaṃsparśi brahma-svarūpam
GE07bhg4c06u:1467: atyantaṃ sarvānantān paricchedān atikrāntaṃ niratiśayaṃ sukham ānandam aśnute vyāpnoti, sarvato-nirvṛttikena
GE07bhg4c06u:1468: laya-vikṣepa-vilakṣaṇam anubhavati, vikṣepe vṛtti-sattvāt, laye ca manaso
GE07bhg4c06u:1477: cittaṃ vikṣipanti yogād apanayantīti citta-vikṣepā yoga-pratipakṣāḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1481: tu sapta vṛtti-sahacaritatayā tat-pratipakṣā ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1484: styānam akarmaṇyatā guruṇā śikṣyamāṇasyāpy āsanādi-karmānarhateti yāvat |
GE07bhg4c06u:1492: 'py ananuṣṭhāna-śīlatā viṣayāntara vyāpratatayā yoga-sādhaneṣv audāsīnyam iti yāvat |
GE07bhg4c06u:1493: ālasyaṃ satyām apy audāsīnya-pracyutau kaphādinā tamasā ca
GE07bhg4c06u:1502: anavasthitatvaṃ labdhāyām api samādhi-bhūmau prayatna-śaithilyāc cittasya tatrāpratiṣṭhitatvam
GE07bhg4c06u:1503: ta ete citta-vikṣepā nava yogamalā yoga-pratipakṣā
GE07bhg4c06u:1507: tac cādhyātmikaṃ śārīraṃ mānasaṃ ca vyādhi-vaśāt kāmādi-vaśāc ca bhavati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1510: daurmanasyam icchā-vighātādi-balavad duḥkhānubhava-janitaś cittasya tāmasaḥ pariṇāma-viśeṣaḥ kṣobhā-para-paryāyaḥ stabdhībhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1516: prāṇana koṣṭhyasya vāyor bahir niḥsaraṇaṃ praśvāsaḥ samādhy-aṅga-pūraka-virodhī |
GE07bhg4c06u:1517: samāhita-cittasyaite na bhavanti vikṣipta-cittasyaiva bhavantīti vikṣepa-sahabhuvo 'ntarāyā eva |
GE07bhg4c06u:1522: īśvara-praṇidhānād vā [YogaS 1.23] iti pakṣāntaram uktvā praṇidheyam īśvaraṃ kleśa-karma-vipākāśayair aparāmṛṣṭaḥ puruṣa-viśeṣa īśvaraḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1524: sa pūrveṣām api guruḥ kālenānavacchedāt [YogaS 1.24-6] iti tribhiḥ sūtraiḥ pratipādya tat-praṇidhānaṃ dvābhyām asūtrayat -- tasya vācakaḥ praṇavaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1533: teṣām antarāyāṇāṃ pratiṣedhārtahm ekasmin kasmiṃścid abhimate tattve 'bhyāsaś
GE07bhg4c06u:1540: sarva-prāṇiṣu sukha-sambhogāpanneṣu sādhv etan mama mitrāṇāṃ sukhitvam iti
GE07bhg4c06u:1544: duḥkha-nivṛttiḥ syād iti kṛpām eva bhāvayet |
GE07bhg4c06u:1546: puṇyavatsu puṇyānumodanena harṣaṃ kuryān na tu vidveṣaṃ na copekṣām |
GE07bhg4c06u:1547: apuṇyavatsu caudāsīnyam eva bhāvayen nānumodanaṃ na vā dveṣam |
GE07bhg4c06u:1548: evam asya bhāvayataḥ śuklo dharma upajāyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:1552: copalakṣaṇam abhayaṃ sattva-saṃśuddhir ity ādīnām amānitvam adambhitvam ity ādīnāṃ ca dharmāṇām, sarveṣām eteṣāṃ śubha-vāsanā-rūpatvena
GE07bhg4c06u:1557: evam anye 'pi prāṇāyāmādaya upāyāś citta-prasādanāya darśitāḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1558: tad etac citta-prasādanaṃ bhagavad-anugraheṇa yasya jātaṃ taṃ praty evaitad vacanam
GE07bhg4c06u:1561: viśvanāthaḥ : tataś ca kṛtārtha eva bhavatīty āha yuñjann iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1562: sukham aśnute jīvan-mukta eva bhavatīty arthaḥ ||28||
GE07bhg4c06u:1563: baladevaḥ : evaṃ svātma-sākṣātkārānantaraṃ paramātma-sākṣātkāraś ca labhata ity āha yuñjann iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1565: yogenānubhavata tenaiva vigata-kalmaṣo dagdha-sarva-doṣo yogī sukhenānāyāsena brahma-saṃsparśaṃ paramātmānubhavam atyantam aparimitaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:1570: śrīdharaḥ : brahma-sākṣātkāram eva darśayati sarva-bhūta-stham iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1577: madhusūdanaḥ : tad evaṃ nirodha-samādhinā tvaṃ-pada-lakṣye tat-pada-lakṣye
GE07bhg4c06u:1578: ca śuddhe sākṣātkṛte tadaikya-gocarā tattvam asīti vedānta-vākya-janyā
GE07bhg4c06u:1580: tataś ca kṛtsnāvidyā-tat-kārya-nivṛttyā brahma-sukham atyantam aśnuta ity
GE07bhg4c06u:1583: sarveṣu bhūteṣu sthāvara-jaṅgameṣu śarīreṣu bhoktṛtayā sthitam ekam eva vibhum ātmānaṃ pratyak-cetanaṃ sākṣiṇaṃ paramārtha-satyam ānanda-ghanaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:1585: tasmiṃś cātmani sākṣiṇi sarvāṇi bhūtāni sākṣyāṇy ādhyāsikena sambandhena bhogyatayā kalpitāni
GE07bhg4c06u:1588: kaḥ ? yoga-yuktātmā yogena nirvikcāra-vaiśāradya-rūpeṇa yuktaṃ prasādaṃ prāpta ātmāntaḥkaraṇaṃ yasya sa tathā |
GE07bhg4c06u:1594: ṛtaṃbhara-saṃjñena yugapat sūkṣmaṃ vyavahitaṃ viprakṛṣṭaṃ ca sarvaṃ tulyam eva paśyatīti sarvatra samaṃ darśanaṃ yasyeti sarvatra sama-darśanaḥ sann ātmānam anātmānaṃ ca yoga-yuktātmā yathā-sthitam īkṣata iti yuktam |
GE07bhg4c06u:1595: athavā yo yoga-yuktātmā yo vā sarvatra-sama-darśanaḥ sa ātmānam īkṣata iti
GE07bhg4c06u:1597: yathā hi citta-vṛtti-nirodhaḥ sākṣi-sākṣātkāra-hetus tathā jaḍa-vivekena
GE07bhg4c06u:1601: dvau kramau citta-nāśasya yogo jñānaṃ ca rāghava |
GE07bhg4c06u:1604: prakārau dvau tato devo jagāda paramaḥ śivaḥ || iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1611: dvitīyas tu sākṣiṇi kalpitaṃ sākṣyam anṛtatvān nāsty eva sākṣy eva tu paramārtha-satyaḥ kevalo vidyata iti vicāraḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1616: śrīmac-chaṅkara-bhagavat-pūjya-pāda-matopajīvinas tv aupaniṣadāḥ prapañcānṛtatva-vādino dvitīyam evopāyam upeyuḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1617: teṣāṃ hy adhiṣṭhāna-jñāna-dārḍhye sati tatra kalpitasya bādhitasya cittasya tad-dṛśyasya cādarśanam anāyāsenaivopapadyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:1619: bhagavat-pūjya-pādāḥ kutrāpi brahma-vidāṃ yogāpekṣāṃ na vyutpādayāṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:1621: ataeva caupaniṣadāḥ paramahaṃsāḥ śraute vedānta-vākya-vicāra eva gurum upasṛtya pravartante brahma-sākṣātkārāya na tu yoge |
GE07bhg4c06u:1631: baladevaḥ : evaṃ niṣpaṇṇa-samādhiḥ pratyakṣita-sva-parātma-yogī parātmanaḥ sarvagatatvaṃ tad anyātmanāṃ druhiṇādīnāṃ sarveṣāṃ tad-āśrayatvaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:1634: siddha-samādhis tad ātmānaṃ ātatatvāc ca mātṛtvād ātmā hi paramo hariḥ iti smṛteḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1635: yo mām iti vivaraṇāc ca paramātmānaṃ sarva-bhūta-stham nikhilaṃ jīvāntaryāmiṇam īkṣate |
GE07bhg4c06u:1636: ātmani tasminn āśraya-bhūte sarva-bhūtāni ca tam eva sarva-jīvāśrayaṃ cekṣate |
GE07bhg4c06u:1639: tat-karmānuguṇyenoccāvacatayā sṛṣṭeṣu sarveṣu jīveṣu samam vaiṣamya-śūnyaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:1642: yo māṃ paśyati sarvatra sarvaṃ ca mayi paśyati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1643: tasyāhaṃ na praṇaśyāmi sa ca me na praṇaśyati ||30||
GE07bhg4c06u:1644: śrīdharaḥ : evambhūtātma-jñāne ca sarva-bhūtātmayā mad-upāsanaṃ mukhyaṃ kāraṇam ity āha yo mām iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1645: māṃ parameśvaraṃ sarvatra bhūta-mātre yaḥ paśyati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1646: sarvaṃ ca prāṇi-mātraṃ mayi yaḥ paśyati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1647: tasyāhaṃ na praṇaśyāmy adṛśyo na bhavāmi |
GE07bhg4c06u:1649: pratyakṣo bhūtvā kṛpā-dṛṣṭyā taṃ vilokyānugṛhṇāmīty arthaḥ ||30||
GE07bhg4c06u:1650: madhusūdanaḥ : evaṃ śuddhaṃ tva-padārthaṃ nirūpya śuddhaṃ tat-padārthaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:1653: aśeṣa-prapañca-kāraṇa-māyopādhikam upādhi-vivekena sarvatra prapañce sad-rūpeṇa sphuraṇa-rūpeṇa cānusyūtaṃ sarvopādhi-vinirmuktaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:1656: tathā sarvaṃ ca prapañca-jātaṃ māyayā mayy āropitaṃ mad-bhinnatayā mṛṣātvenaiva paśyati
GE07bhg4c06u:1665: evaṃ yogajena pratyakṣeṇa mām aparokṣīkurvan sa ca me na praṇaśyati parokṣo na bhavati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1666: svātmā hi mama sa vidvān atipriyatvāt sarvadā mad-aparokṣa-jñāna-gocaro bhavati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1667: ye yathā māṃ prapadyante tāṃs tathaiva bhajāmy aham [Gītā 4.11] ity ukteḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1670: avidvāṃs tu svātmānam api santaṃ bhagavantaṃ na parśyati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1671: ato bhagavān paśyann api taṃ na paśyati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1672: sa enam avidito na bhunakti [BAU 1.4.15] iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1673: vidvāṃs tu sadaiva saṃnihito bhagavato 'nugraha-bhājanam ity arthaḥ ||30||
GE07bhg4c06u:1674: viśvanāthaḥ : evam aparokṣānubhavinaḥ phalam āha yo mām iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1677: śāśvatikyāṃ satyāṃ sa yogī me mad-upāsako na praṇaśyati na kadācid api bhraśyati ||30||
GE07bhg4c06u:1678: baladevaḥ : etad vivṛṇvan tathātva-darśinaḥ phalam āha yo mām iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1679: tasya tādṛśasya yogino 'haṃ paramātmā na praṇaśyāmi nādṛśyo bhavāmi |
GE07bhg4c06u:1680: sa ca yogī me na praṇaśyati nādṛśyo bhavati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1683: sarva-bhūta-sthitaṃ yo māṃ bhajaty ekatvam āsthitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1684: sarvathā vartamāno 'pi sa yogī mayi vartate ||31||
GE07bhg4c06u:1685: śrīdharaḥ : na caivaṃ-bhūto vidhi-kiṅkaraḥ syād ity āha
GE07bhg4c06u:1687: sarva-bhūteṣu sthitaṃ mām abhedam āsthita āśrito yo bhajati sa yogī jñānī sarvathā karma-parityāgenāpi vartamāno mayy eva
GE07bhg4c06u:1690: madhusūdanaḥ : evaṃ tvaṃ-padārthaṃ tat-padārthaṃ ca śuddhaṃ nirūpya
GE07bhg4c06u:1691: tattvam asīti vākyārthaṃ nirūpayati sarva-bhūtam iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1692: sarveṣu bhūteṣv adhiṣṭhānatayā sthitaṃ sarvānusyūta-san-mātraṃ mām īśvaraṃ tat-pada-lakṣyaṃ svena tvaṃ-pada-lakṣyeṇa sahaikatvam atyantābhedam āsthito ghaṭākāśo mahākāśa ity atrevopādhi-bheda-nirākaraṇena niścinvan yo bhajati ahaṃ brahmāsmīti vedānta-vākyajena sākṣātkāreṇāparokṣīkaroti so 'vidyā-tat-kārya-nivṛttyā jīvanmuktaḥ kṛta-kṛtya eva bhavati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1693: yāvat tu tasya bādhitānuvṛttyā śarīrādi-darśanam anuvartate tāvat prārabhda-karma-prābalyāt sarva-karma-tyāgena vā yājñavalkyādivat |
GE07bhg4c06u:1694: vihitena karmaṇā vā janakādivat, pratiṣiddhena karmaṇā vā dattātreyādivat
GE07bhg4c06u:1695: | sarvathā yena kenāpi rūpeṇa vartamāno 'pi vyavaharann aḸ sa yogī brahmāham asamīti vidvān mayi paramātmany evābhedena vartate |
GE07bhg4c06u:1696: sarvathā tasya mokṣaṃ prati nāsti pratibandha-śaṅkā tasya ha na devāś canābhūtyā īśata ātmā hy eṣāṃ sa bhavati [BAU 1.4.10] iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1698: api tasya mokṣābhavanāya neśate kim utānye kṣudrā ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1701: niṣiddha-karmāsambhave 'pi tad aṅgīkṛtya jñāna-stuty-artham idam uktaṃ sarvathā vartamāno 'pīti hatvāpi sa imān lokān na hanti na nibadhyate [Gītā 18.17] itivat ||31||
GE07bhg4c06u:1702: viśvanāthaḥ : evaṃ mad-aparokṣānubhavāt pūrva-daśāyām api sarvatra parātma-bhāvanayā bhajato yogino na vidhi-kaiṅkaryam ity āha sarveti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1703: paramātmaiva sarva-karaṇatvād eko 'stīty ekatvam āsthitaḥ san yo bhajati,
GE07bhg4c06u:1704: śravaṇa-smaraṇādi-bhajana-yukto bhavati, sa sarvathā śāstroktaṃ karma kurvann akurvan vā vartamāno mayi vartate, na tu saṃsāre ||31||
GE07bhg4c06u:1705: baladevaḥ : sa yogī mamācintya-svarūpa-śaktim anubhavann atipriyo bhavatīty āśayavān āha sarveti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1707: caturbāhur atasī-puṣpa-prabhaś cakrādidharo 'haṃ pṛthak pṛthaṅ nivasāmi |
GE07bhg4c06u:1708: teṣu bahūnāṃ mad-vigrahāṇām ekatvam abhedam āśrito yo māṃ bhajati
GE07bhg4c06u:1709: dhyāyati, so yogī sarvathā vartamāno vyutthāna-kāle sva-vihitaṃ karma kurvann akurvan vā mayi
GE07bhg4c06u:1711: mat-sāmīpya-lakṣaṇaṃ mokṣaṃ vindati, na tu saṃsāram ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1712: śrutiś ca harer acintya-śatkikatām āha eko 'pi san bahudhā yo 'vabhāti iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1714: eka eva paro viṣṇuḥ sarva-vyāpī na saṃśayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1715: aiśvaryād rūpam ekaṃ ca sūryavad bahudheyate || iti ||31||
GE07bhg4c06u:1718: sukhaṃ vā yadi vā duḥkhaṃ sa yogī paramo mataḥ ||32||
GE07bhg4c06u:1719: śrīdharaḥ : evaṃ ca māṃ bhajatāṃ yogināṃ madhye sarva-bhūtānukampī śreṣṭha ity āha ātmaupamyeneti
GE07bhg4c06u:1721: yathā mama sukhaṃ priyaṃ duḥkhaṃ cāpriyaṃ tathānyeṣāṃ apīti sarvatra samaṃ paśyan sukham eva sarveṣāṃ yo vāñchati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1723: sa yogī śreṣṭho mamābhimata ity arthaḥ ||32||
GE07bhg4c06u:1726: citta-vikṣepeṇa ca dṛṣṭa-duḥkham anubhavati so 'paramo yogī deha-pāte
GE07bhg4c06u:1731: prārabdha-karma-vaśāt samādher vyutthāna-kāle kiṃ syāt ? ity ucyata ātmaupamyeneti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1732: ātmaivaupamyam upamā tenātma-dṛṣṭāntena sarvatra prāṇi-jāte sukhaṃ vā yadi
GE07bhg4c06u:1733: vā duḥkhaṃ samaṃ tulyaṃ yaḥ paśyati svasyāniṣṭaṃ yathā na sampādayati evaṃ parasyāpy aniṣṭaṃ yo na sampādayati pradveṣa-śūnyatvāt, sa
GE07bhg4c06u:1734: nirvāsanatayopaśānta-manā yogī brahmavit paramaḥ śreṣṭho mataḥ pūrvasmāt,
GE07bhg4c06u:1736: atas tattva-jñāna-mano-nāśa-vāsanā-kṣayāṇām akramam abhyāsāya mahān prayatna āstheya ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1737: tatredaṃ sarvaṃ dvaita-jātam advitīye cid-ānandātmani māyayā kalpitatvān mṛṣaivātmaivaikaḥ paramārtha-satyaḥ sac-cid-ānandādvayo 'ham asmīti jñānaṃ tattva-jñānaṃ pradīpa-jvālā-santānavad vṛtti-santāna-rūpeṇa pariṇamamānam
GE07bhg4c06u:1741: pūrvāpara-parāmarśam antareṇa sahasotpadyamānasya krodhādi-vṛtti-viśeṣasya hetuś citta-gataḥ saṃskāra-viśeṣo vāsanā
GE07bhg4c06u:1744: viveka-janyāyāṃ citta-praśama-vāsanāyāṃ dṛḍhāyāṃ saty api bāhye nimitte krodhādy-anutpattiḥ
GE07bhg4c06u:1746: nara-viṣāṇādāv iva dhī-vṛtty-anudayād ātmanaś ca dṛṣṭatvena
GE07bhg4c06u:1748: naṣṭe ca manasi saṃskārodbodhakasya bāhyasya nimittasyāpratītau vāsanā kṣīyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:1749: kṣīṇāyāṃ vāsanāyāṃ hetv-abhāvena krodhādi-vṛtty-anudayān mano naśyati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1750: naṣṭe ca manasi śama-damādi-sampattyā tattva-jñānam udeti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1751: evam utpanne tattva-jñāne rāga-dveṣādi-rūpā vāsanā kṣīyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:1752: kṣīṇāyāṃ ca vāsanāyāṃ pratibandhābhāvāt tattva-jñānodaya iti paraspara-kāraṇatvaṃ darśanīyam
GE07bhg4c06u:1755: mithaḥ kāraṇatāṃ gatvā duḥsādhyāni sthitāni hi ||
GE07bhg4c06u:1757: bhogecchāṃ dūratas tyaktvā trayam etat samāśraya || iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1758: pauruṣo yatnaḥ kenāpy upāyenāvaśyaṃ sampādayiṣyāmīty evaṃ-vidhotsāha-rūpo
GE07bhg4c06u:1761: tattva-jñānasya śravaṇādikaṃ sādhanaṃ mano-nāśasya yogaḥ vāsanā-kṣayasya pratikūla-vāsanotpādanam iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1762: etādṛśa-viveka-yuktena pauruṣeṇa prayatnena bhogecchāyāḥ svalpāyā api haviṣā kṛṣṇa-vartmeveti nyāyena vāsanā-vṛddhi-hetutvād dūrata ity uktam |
GE07bhg4c06u:1763: dvividho hi vidyādhikārī kṛtopāstir akṛtopāstiś ca |
GE07bhg4c06u:1764: tatra ya upāsya-sākṣātkāra-paryantām upāstiṃ kṛtvā tattva-jñānāya pravṛttas tasya vāsanā-kṣaya-mano-nāśaayor dṛḍhataratvena jñānād ūrdhvaṃ jīvan-muktiḥ
GE07bhg4c06u:1766: idānīṃtanas tu prāyeṇākṛtopāstir eva mumukṣur autsukya-mātrāt sahasā vidyāyāṃ pravartate
GE07bhg4c06u:1767: yogaṃ vinā cij-jaḍa-viveka-mātreṇaiva ca mano-nāśa-vāsanā-kṣayau tātkālikau sampādya śama-damādi-sampattyā śravana-manana-nididhyāsanāni sampādayati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1768: taiś ca dṛḍhābhyastaiḥ sarva-bandha-vicchedi tattva-jñānam udeti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1770: mṛtyuḥ punar janma cety aneka-vidho bandho jñānān nivartate |
GE07bhg4c06u:1771: tathā ca śrūyate - yo veda nihitaṃ guhāyāṃ so 'vidyā-granthiṃ vikiratīha somya []
GE07bhg4c06u:1774: kṣīyante cāsya karmāṇi tasmin dṛṣṭe parāvare || [MuṇḍU 2.2.8]
GE07bhg4c06u:1776: yo veda nihitaṃ guhāyāṃ parame vyoman |
GE07bhg4c06u:1778: 'śnute sarvān kāmān saha [TaittU 1.1] tam eva viditvātimṛtyum eti [ŚvetU
GE07bhg4c06u:1779: yas tu vijñānavān bhavati sa-manaskaḥ sadā śuciḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1780: sa tu tat-padam āpnoti yasmād bhūyo na jāyate || [KaṭhU 1.3.8]
GE07bhg4c06u:1781: ya evaṃ vedāhaṃ brahmāsmīti sa idaṃ sarvaṃ bhavati [BAU 1.4.10] ity
GE07bhg4c06u:1785: brahmaṇy avidyādhyāropitānām eteṣāṃ bandhānām avidyā-nāśe sati nivṛttau punar utpatty-asambhavāt
GE07bhg4c06u:1788: mano-nāśa-vāsanā-kṣayautu dṛḍhābhyāsābhāvād bhoga-pradena prārabdhena karmaṇā bādhyamānatvāc ca savāta-pradeśa-pradīpavat sahasā nivartete |
GE07bhg4c06u:1789: ata idānīṃtanasya tattva-jñāninaḥ prāk-siddhe tattva-jñāne na prayatnāpekṣā |
GE07bhg4c06u:1796: yad ādānaṃ padārthasya vāsanā sā prakīrtitā ||
GE07bhg4c06u:1799: sā ca vāsanā dvividhā malinā śuddhā ca |
GE07bhg4c06u:1805: sarve janā yathā na nindanti tathaivācariṣyāmīty aśakyārthābhiniveśo loka-vāsanā |
GE07bhg4c06u:1806: tasyāś ca ko lokam ārādhayituṃ samartha iti nyāyena sampādayitum aśakyatvāt puruṣārthānupayogitvāc ca malinatvam |
GE07bhg4c06u:1807: śāstra-vāsanā tu trividhā pāṭha-vyasanaṃ bahu-śāstra-vyasanam anuṣṭhāna-vyasanaṃ ceti krameṇa bharadvājasya durvāsaso nidāghasya ca prasiddhā |
GE07bhg4c06u:1808: malinatvaṃ cāsyāḥ kleśāvahatvāt puruṣārthānupayogitvād darpa-hetutvāj janma-hetutvāc ca |
GE07bhg4c06u:1816: doṣāpanayanam api dvividhaṃ laukikaṃ śāstrīyaṃ ca |
GE07bhg4c06u:1819: etasyāś ca sarva-prakārāyā malinatvam aprāmāṇikatvād aśakyatvāt puruṣārthānupayogitvāt punar-janma-hetutvāc ca |
GE07bhg4c06u:1820: tad etal-loka-śāstra-deha-vāsanā-trayam avivekanām upādeyatvena pratibhāsamānam api vividiṣor vedanotpatti-virodhitvād viduṣo
GE07bhg4c06u:1838: asmin pakṣe pūrvoktānāṃ catasṛṇām anayor evāntarbhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1842: bhagavatā patañjalinā sūtritāḥ prāk saṃkṣepeṇa vyākhyātā api punar vyākhyāyante |
GE07bhg4c06u:1846: mohād anubhūyamānaṃ sukham anuśete kaścid dhī-vṛtti-viśeṣo
GE07bhg4c06u:1847: rājasaḥ sarvaṃ sukha-jātīyaṃ me bhūyād iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1850: yadā tu sukhiu prāṇiṣv ayaṃ maitrīṃ bhāvayet sarve 'py ete sukhino madīyā iti tadā tat sukhaṃ svakīyam eva sampannam iti bhāvayatas
GE07bhg4c06u:1852: yathā svasya rājya-nivṛttāv api putrādi-rājyam eva svakīyaṃ rājyaṃ tadvat |
GE07bhg4c06u:1853: nivṛtte ca rāge varṣāvyapāye jalam iva cittaṃ prasīdati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1854: tathā duḥkhānuśayī dveṣaḥ [YogaS 2.8] duḥkham anuśete kaścd
GE07bhg4c06u:1857: tac ca śatru-vyāghrādiṣu satsya na nivārayituṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:1859: na ca sarve te duḥkha-hetavo hantuṃ śakyante |
GE07bhg4c06u:1860: ataḥ sa dveṣaḥ sadā hṛdayaṃ dahati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1861: yadā tu svasyeva pareṣāṃ sarveṣām api duḥkham mā bhūd iti karuṇāṃ duḥkhiṣu bhāvayet tadā vairyādi-dveṣa-nivṛttau cittaṃ prasīdati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1863: prāṇā yathātmano 'bhīṣṭā bhūtānām api te tathā |
GE07bhg4c06u:1864: ātmaupamyena bhūteṣu dayāṃ kurvanti sādhavaḥ || iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1865: etad evehāpy uktam - ātmaupamyena sarvatrety ādi |
GE07bhg4c06u:1866: tathā prāṇinaḥ svabhāvata eva puṇyaṃ nānutiṣṭhanti pāpaṃ tv anutiṣṭhanti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1868: puṇyasya phalam icchanti puṇyaṃ necchanti mānavāḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1869: na pāpa-phalam icchanti pāpaṃ kurvanti yatnataḥ || iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1870: te ca puṇya-pāpe akriyamāṇa-kriyamāṇe paścāt-tāpaṃ janayataḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1871: sa ca śrutyānūditaḥ - kim ahaṃ sādhu nākaravaṃ kim ahaṃ pāpam akaravam iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1872: yady asau puṇya-puruṣeṣu muditāṃ bhāvayet tadā tad-vāsanāvān svayam evāpramatto 'śukla-kṛṣṇe puṇye pravartate |
GE07bhg4c06u:1874: yoginas trividham itareṣām ayogināṃ trividhaṃ śuklaṃ śubhaṃ kṛṣṇam aśubhaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:1876: tathā pāpa-puruṣeṣūpekṣāṃ bhāvayan svayam api tad-vāsanāvān pāpān nivartate |
GE07bhg4c06u:1877: tataś ca puṇyākaraṇa-pāpa-karaṇa-nimittasya paścāt-tāpasyābhāve cittaṃ prasīdati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1878: evaṃ sukhiṣu maitrīṃ bhāvayato na kevalaṃ rāgo nivartate kiṃtv asūyerṣyādayo 'pi nivartante
GE07bhg4c06u:1881: yadā maitrī-vaśāt para-sukhaṃ svīyam eva sampannaṃ tadā para-guṇeṣu katham asūyādikaṃ sambhavet
GE07bhg4c06u:1882: tathā duḥkhiṣu karuṇāṃ bhāvayataḥ śatru-vadhādikaro dveṣo yadā nivartate tadā
GE07bhg4c06u:1886: tad evaṃ tattva-jñānaṃ mano-nāśo vāsanā-kṣayaś ceti trayam abhyasanīyam |
GE07bhg4c06u:1887: tatra kenāpi dvāreṇa punaḥ punas tattvānusmaraṇaṃ tattva-jñānābhyāsaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1890: etad eka-paratvaṃ ca brahmābhyāsaṃ vidur budhāḥ ||
GE07bhg4c06u:1891: sargādāv eva notpannaṃ dṛśyaṃ nāsty eva tat sadā |
GE07bhg4c06u:1892: idaṃ jagad ahaṃ ceti bodhābhyāsaṃ viduḥ param || iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1896: yuktyā śāstrair yatante ye te 'py atrābhyāsinaḥ sthitāḥ || iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1901: ratir ghanoditā yāsau brahmābhyāsaḥ sa ucyate ||
GE07bhg4c06u:1903: tasmād upapannam etat tattva-jñānābhyāsena mano-nāśābhyāsena vāsanā-kṣayābhyāsena ca
GE07bhg4c06u:1904: rāga-dveṣa-śūnyatayā yaḥ sva-para-sukha-duḥkhādiṣu sama-dṛṣṭiḥ sa paramo yogī mato yas tu viṣama-dṛṣṭiḥ sa tattva-jñānavān apy aparamo yogīti
GE07bhg4c06u:1905: viśvanāthaḥ : kiṃ ca, sādhana-daśāyāṃ yogī sarvatra samaḥ syād ity uktam |
GE07bhg4c06u:1907: sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ veti yathā mama sukhaṃ priyaṃ duḥkham apriyaṃ, tathaivānyeṣām apīti sarvatra
GE07bhg4c06u:1908: samaṃ paśyan sukham eva sarveṣāṃ yo vāñchati, na tu kasyāpi duḥkham, sa yogī śreṣṭho mamābhimataḥ
GE07bhg4c06u:1909: baladevaḥ : sarva-bhūta-hite rataḥ iti yat prāg uktaṃ, tad viśadayati ātmaupamyeneti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1910: vyutthāna-daśāyām ātmaupamyena sva-sādṛśyena sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ ca yaḥ sarvatra samaṃ paśyati
GE07bhg4c06u:1912: na tu duḥkham, sa sva-para-sukha-duḥkha-sama-dṛṣṭiḥ sarvānukampī yogī mama
GE07bhg4c06u:1917: arjuna uvāca yo 'yaṃ yogas tvayā proktaḥ sāmyena madhusūdana |
GE07bhg4c06u:1918: etasyāhaṃ na paśyāmi cañcalatvāt sthitiṃ sthirām ||33||
GE07bhg4c06u:1919: śrīdharaḥ : ukta-lakṣaṇasya yogasyāsambhavaṃ manvāno 'rjuna uvāca yo 'yam
GE07bhg4c06u:1924: etasya sthirāṃ dīrgha-kālāṃ sthitiṃ na paśyāmi
GE07bhg4c06u:1926: madhusūdanaḥ : uktam artham ākṣipan arjuna uvāca yo 'yam iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1928: sarvatra samaṣṭi-lakṣaṇaḥ paramo yogaḥ sāmyena samatvena citta-gatānāṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:1933: dīrgha-kālānuvartinīṃ na paśyāmi na sambhāvayāmi aham asmad-vidho 'nyo vā
GE07bhg4c06u:1935: kasmān na sambhāvayasi tatrāha cañcalatvāt, manasa iti śeṣaḥ ||33||
GE07bhg4c06u:1936: viśvanāthaḥ : bhagavad-ukta-lakṣaṇasya sāmyasya duṣkaratvam ālakṣyovāca yo
GE07bhg4c06u:1938: etasya sāmyena prāptasya yogasya sthirāṃ sārvadikīṃ sthitiṃ na paśyāmi |
GE07bhg4c06u:1939: eṣa yogaḥ sarvadā na tiṣṭhati kintu tri-catura-dināny evety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1942: sarva-jagad-varti-janānāṃ sukha-duḥkhaṃ paśyed iti sāmyam uktam |
GE07bhg4c06u:1943: tatra ye bandhavas taṭasthāś ca teṣu sāmyaṃ bhaved api, ye ripavo ghātakā dveṣṭāro nindakāś ca teṣu na sambhaved eva |
GE07bhg4c06u:1944: na hi mayā svasya yudhiṣṭhirasya duryodhanasya ca sukha-duḥkhe sarvathā tulye draṣṭuṃ śakyete
GE07bhg4c06u:1945: yadi ca svasya sva-ripūṇāṃ ca jīvātma-paramātma-prāṇendriya-daihika-bhūtāni samāny eveti vivekena prabalasyāticañcalasya manaso nigrahaṇāśakyatvāt |
GE07bhg4c06u:1946: pratyuta viṣayāsaktena tena manasaiva vivekasya grasyamānatva-darśanād iti ||33||
GE07bhg4c06u:1947: baladevaḥ : uktam ākṣipann arjuna uvāca yo 'yam iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1949: sva-para-sukha-duḥkha-taulyena yo 'yaṃ yogas tvayā sarvajñena proktas tasya sthirāṃ sārvadikīṃ sthitiṃ niṣṭhām apy ahaṃ na paśyāmi, kintu
GE07bhg4c06u:1953: bandhuṣu udāsīneṣu ca tat sāmyaṃ kadācit syāt |
GE07bhg4c06u:1954: na ca śatruṣu nindakeṣu ca kadācid api |
