GE07bhg4c06u:2269: ātma-sākṣātkāreṇa jīvan-muktaṃ para-prabodhana-dakṣaṃ gurum upasṛtya tato
GE07bhg4c06u:2272: brahma-jijñāsā [Vs 1.1.1] ity ādy anāvṛttiḥ śabdāt [Vs 4.4.23] ity antayā catur-lakṣaṇa-mīmāṃsayā śravaṇa-manana-nididhyāsanāni guru-prasādāt kartum ārabhate sa śraddadhāno 'pi sann āyuṣo 'lpatvenālpa-prayatnatvād
GE07bhg4c06u:2273: alabdha-jñāna-paripākaḥ śravaṇa-manana-nididhyāsaneṣu kriyamāṇeṣv eva madhye vyāpadyate
GE07bhg4c06u:2278: ata etādṛśo yoga-bhraṣṭaḥ kīṭādi-bhāvena kaṣṭāṃ gatim iyād ajñatve sati deva-yāna-pitṛ-yāna-mārgāsambandhitvād
GE07bhg4c06u:2282: yatir yatna-śīlaḥ alpārthe nañ alavaṇā yavāgūr ity-ādivat |
GE07bhg4c06u:2287: śraddhā ca sva-sahacaritānāṃ śamādīnām upalakṣaṇaṃ śānto dānta uparatas titikṣuḥ śraddhānvito bhūtvātmany evātmānaṃ paśyati iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:2290: sādhana-catuṣṭaya-sampanno gurum upasṛtya vedānta-vākya-śravaṇādi kurvann api paramāyuṣo 'lpatvena maraṇa-kāle cendriyāṇāṃ vyākulatvena sādhanānuṣṭhānāsambhavād yogāc calita-mānaso yogāc
GE07bhg4c06u:2292: aprāptaṃ mānasaṃ yasya sa yogāniṣpattyaivāprāpya yoga-saṃsiddhiṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:2294: aprāpyātattva-jña eva mṛtaḥ san kāṃ gatiṃ he kṛṣṇa gacchati sugatiṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:2295: durgatiṃ vā ? karmaṇāṃ parityāgāj jñānasya cānutpatteḥ
GE07bhg4c06u:2297: viśvanāthaḥ : nanv abhyāsa-vairāgyābhyāṃ prayatnavataiva puṃsā yogo
GE07bhg4c06u:2299: yasyaitat tritayam api na dṛśyate, tasya kā gatir iti pṛcchati |
GE07bhg4c06u:2300: ayatir alpa-yatnaḥ anavarṇāya vāgur itivad alpārthe nañ |
GE07bhg4c06u:2301: atha ca śraddhayopeto yoga-śāstrāstikyena tatra śraddhayopeto yogābhyāsa pravṛtta eva, na tu loka-vañcakatvena mithyācāraḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:2303: abhyāsa-vairāgyayor abhāvena yogāc calitaṃ viṣaya-pravaṇī-bhūtaṃ mānasaṃ yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:2304: ataeva yogasya saṃsiddhiṃ samyak siddhim aprāpyeti yat kiñcit siddhiṃ tu prāpta eveti yogārurukṣā-bhūmikāto 'grimāṃ yogāroha-bhūmikāyāḥ
GE07bhg4c06u:2309: tan-mahimānaṃ śrotum arjunaḥ pṛcchati ayatir iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:2314: kintv ayatir alpa-svadharmānuṣṭhāna-yatnavān anudārā yuvatiḥ itivad alpārthe 'tra nañ |
GE07bhg4c06u:2315: śithila-prayatnatvād eva yogād aṣṭāṅgāc calitaṃ viṣaya-pravaṇaṃ mānasaṃ yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:2316: evaṃ ca svadharmānuṣṭhānābhyāsa-vairāgya-śaithilyād vividhasya yogasya samyak siddhiṃ hṛd-viśuddh-lakṣaṇām
GE07bhg4c06u:2317: cāprāptaḥ kiṃcit siddhiṃ tu prāpta eva |
GE07bhg4c06u:2318: śraddhāluḥ kiṃcid anuṣṭhita-svadharmaḥ prārabdha-yogo 'prāpta-yoga-phalo dehānte kāṃ gatiṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:2324: karmaṇām īśvare 'rpitatvād ananuṣṭhānāc ca tāvat karma-phalaṃ svargādikaṃ na prāpnoti |
GE07bhg4c06u:2328: ataeva brahmaṇaḥ prāpty-upāye pathi mārge vimūḍhaḥ san kaccit kiṃ naśyati ? kiṃ vā na naśyatīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:2329: nāśe dṛṣṭāntaḥ - yathā cchinnam abhraṃ pūrvasmād abhrād viśliṣṭam abhrāntaraṃ cāprāptaṃ san madhya eva
GE07bhg4c06u:2331: madhusūdanaḥ : etad eva saṃśaya-bījaṃ vivṛṇoti kaccid iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:2333: he mahābāho mahāntaḥ sarveṣāṃ bhaktānāṃ sarvopadrava-nivāraṇa-samarthāḥ puruṣārtah-catuṣṭaya-dāna-samarthā vā catvāro bāhavo yasyeti praśna-nimitta-krodhābhāvas
GE07bhg4c06u:2335: brahmaṇaḥ pathi brahma-prāpti-mārge jñāne vimūḍho vicittaḥ,
GE07bhg4c06u:2339: pratiṣṭhābhyāṃ sādhanābhyāṃ rahitaḥ sopāsanānāṃ sarveṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ parityāgāt |
GE07bhg4c06u:2340: etādṛśa ubhaya-vibhraṣṭaḥ karma-mārgāj jñāna-mārgāc ca vibhraṣṭaś chinnābhram iva vāyunā chinnaṃ viśakalitaṃ pūrvasmān meghād
GE07bhg4c06u:2341: bhraṣṭam uttaraṃ megham aprāptam abhraṃ yathā vṛṣṭy-ayogyaṃ sad-antarāla
GE07bhg4c06u:2342: eva naśyati tathā yoga-bhraṣṭo 'pi pūrvasmāt karma-mārgād vicchinna uttaraṃ ca jñāna-mārgam aprāpto 'ntarāla eva naśyati karma-phalaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:2343: jñāna-phalaṃ ca labdhum ayogyo na kim iti praśnārthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:2349: karma-sambhave 'pi phala-kāmanā-tyāgāt phala-bhraṃśa-vacanam avakalpata iti vācyaṃ niṣkāmānām api karmaṇāṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:2356: yoga-mārgaṃ ca samyag aprāpta ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:2357: chinnābhram iveti yathā chinnam abhraṃ meghaḥ pūrvasmād abhrād viśliṣṭam abhrāntaraṃ cāprāptaṃ sat madhye vilīyate tenāsya iha loke yoga-mārge praveśād viṣaya-bhoga-tyāgecchā
GE07bhg4c06u:2361: mokṣa-sādhanasya yogasyāpy aparipākān na svarga-mokṣāv ity ubhaya-loka evāsya vināśa iti dyotitam |
GE07bhg4c06u:2363: brahma-prāpty-upāye pathi mārge vimūḍho 'yam apratiṣṭhaḥ pratiṣṭhām āspadam aprāptaḥ san kaccit kiṃ naśyati na naśyati tvaṃ pṛcchyase ||38||
GE07bhg4c06u:2364: baladevaḥ : praśnāśayaṃ viśadayati kaccid iti praśne |
GE07bhg4c06u:2365: niṣkāmatayā karmaṇo 'nuṣṭhānān na svargādi-phalaṃ yogāsiddher nātmāvalokanaṃ ca tasyābhūt
GE07bhg4c06u:2366: evam ubhayasmād vibhraṣṭo 'pratiṣṭho nirālambaḥ san kiṃ naśyati kiṃ vā na naśyati ? ity arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c06u:2367: chinnābhram iveti abhraṃ megho yathā pūrvasmād abhrād vicchinnaṃ param abhraṃ cāprāptam antarāle vilīyate, tadvad eveti nāśe dṛṣṭāntaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:2368: katham evaṃ śaṅkā ? tatrāha - brahmaṇaḥ pathi prāpty-upāye yad asau vimūḍhaḥ ||38||
GE07bhg4c06u:2370: etan me saṃśayaṃ kṛṣṇa chettum arhasy aśeṣataḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:2371: tvad-anyaḥ saṃśayasyāsya chettā na hy upapadyate ||39||
GE07bhg4c06u:2372: śrīdharaḥ : tvayaiva sarvajñenāyaṃ mama sandeho nirasanīyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:2374: tv etat sandeha-nivartako nāsti ity āha etad iti etad enam |
GE07bhg4c06u:2376: madhusūdanaḥ : yathopadarśita-saṃśayāpākaraṇāya bhagavantam antaryāmiṇam arthayate pārthaḥ etan ma iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:2377: etad evaṃ pūrvopadarśitaṃ me mama saṃśayaṃ he kṛṣṇa cchettum apanetum arhasy aśeṣataḥ saṃśaya-mūlādharmādy-ucchedena
GE07bhg4c06u:2378: | mad-anyaḥ kaścid ṛṣir vā devo vā tvadīyam imaṃ saṃśayam ucchetsyatīty
GE07bhg4c06u:2381: parama-guroḥ kāruṇikād anyo 'nīśvaratvena asarvajñaḥ kaścid ṛṣir vā devo vāsya yoga-bhraṣṭa-para-loka-gati-viṣayasya saṃśayasya cchettā samyag-uttara-dānena nāśayitā hi yasmā̆n nopapadyate na sambhavati tasmāt tvam eva pratyakṣa-darśī sarvasya parama-guruḥ saṃśayam etaṃ mama cchettum arhasīty arthaḥ viśvanāthaḥ : etad etam ||39||
GE07bhg4c06u:2386: śrī-bhagavān uvāca pārtha naiveha nāmutra vināśas tasya vidyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:2387: na hi kalyāṇa-kṛt kaścid durgatiṃ tāta gacchati ||40||
GE07bhg4c06u:2388: śrīdharaḥ : tatrottaraṃ śrī-bhagavān uvāca pārtheti sārdhaiś caturbhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:2394: cubha-kārī kaścid api durgatiṃ na gacchati |
GE07bhg4c06u:2395: ayaṃ ca śubhakārī śraddayā yoge pravṛttatvāt |
GE07bhg4c06u:2397: madhusūdanaḥ : evam arjunasya yoginaṃ prati nāśāśaṅkāṃ pariharann uttaraṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:2400: kim iha loke śiṣṭa-garhaṇīyo bhavati veda-vihita-karma-tyāgāt |
GE07bhg4c06u:2402: kiṃ vā paratra nikṛṣṭāṃ gatiṃ prāpnoti |
GE07bhg4c06u:2403: yathoktaṃ śrutyā - athaitayoḥ pathor na katareṇacana te kīṭāḥ pataṅgā yadi dandaśūkam iti
GE07bhg4c06u:2404: tathā coktaṃ manunā -- vāntāśy ulkā-mukhaḥ preto vipro dharmāt svakāc cyutaḥ [Manu 12.71] ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c06u:2405: tad ubhayam api nety āha he pārtha pārtha naiveha nāmutra vināśas tasya yathā-śāstraṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:2408: ubhayatrāpi tasya vināśo nāstīty atra hetum āha hi yasmāt kalyāṇa-kṛc
GE07bhg4c06u:2409: chāstra-vihita-kārī kaścid api durgatim ihākīrtiṃ paratra ca
GE07bhg4c06u:2411: ayaṃ tu sarvotkṛṣṭa eva san durgatiṃ na gacchatīti kim u vaktavyam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:2412: tanoty ātmānaṃ putra-rūpeṇeti pitā tata ucyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:2414: pitaiva ca putra-rūpeṇa bhajatīti putra-sthānīyasya śiṣyasya tāteti sambodhanaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:2416: yad uktaṃ yoga-bhraṣṭaḥ kaṣṭāṃ gatiṃ gacchati
GE07bhg4c06u:2422: pañcāgni-vidyāyāṃ ya itthaṃ vidur ye cāmī araṇye śraddhāṃ satyam upāsate te 'rcir
GE07bhg4c06u:2434: yadi tu satya-śabdena brahmaivocyate tadāpi na
GE07bhg4c06u:2438: tathā ca smṛtiḥ saṃnyāsād brahmaṇaḥ sthānam iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:2443: sarva-sukṛta-rūpatvaṃ yogi-caritasya taittirīyā āmananti tasyaivaṃ viduṣo yajñasya ity ādinā
GE07bhg4c06u:2445: snātaṃ tena samasta-tīrtha-salile sarvā 'pi dattāvanir yajñānāṃ ca kṛtaṃ sahasram akhilā devāś ca sampūjitāḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:2446: saṃsārāc ca samuddhṛtāḥ sva-pitaras trailokya-pūjyo 'py asau yasya brahma-vicāraṇe kṣaṇam api sthairyaṃ manaḥ prāpnuyāt || iti ||40||
GE07bhg4c06u:2447: viśvanāthaḥ : iha loke amutra para-loke 'pi kalyāṇaṃ kalyāṇa-prāpakaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:2449: baladevaḥ : evaṃ pṛṣṭo bhagavān uvāca pārtheti |
GE07bhg4c06u:2451: yogina iha prākṛtike loke 'mutrāprākṛtike ca loke vināśaḥ
GE07bhg4c06u:2452: svargādi-sukha-vibhraṃśa-lakṣaṇaḥ paramātmāvalokana-vibhraṃśa-lakṣaṇaś ca na vidyate na bhavati
GE07bhg4c06u:2460: tata eva tātaḥ putraṃ śiṣyaṃ cātikṛpayā jyeṣṭas tathā sambodhayati ||40||
GE07bhg4c06u:2462: prāpya puṇya-kṛtāṃ lokān uṣitvā śāśvatīḥ samāḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:2464: śrīdharaḥ : tarhi kim asau prāpnotīty apekṣāyām āha prāpyeti |
GE07bhg4c06u:2466: puṇya-kāriṇām aśvamedhādi-yājināṃ lokān prāpya tatra śāśvatīḥ samāḥ bahūn
GE07bhg4c06u:2467: saṃvatsarān uṣitvā vāsa-sukham anubhūya śucīnāṃ sad-ācārāṇāṃ śrīmatāṃ dhaninām |
GE07bhg4c06u:2469: madhusūdanaḥ : tad evaṃ yoga-bhraṣṭasya śubha-kṛttvena loka-dvaye 'pi
GE07bhg4c06u:2472: sarva-karma-saṃnyāsī vedānta-śravaṇādi kurvann antarāle mriyamāṇaḥ kaścit
GE07bhg4c06u:2478: tatra coṣitvā vāsam anubhūya śāśvatīr brahma-parimāṇenākṣāyāḥ samāḥ saṃvatsarān, tad-ante śucīnāṃ śuddhānāṃ śrīmatāṃ vibhūtimatāṃ mahārāja-cakravartināṃ gehe kule bhoga-vāsanāśoṣa-sad-bhāvād ajātaśatru-janakādivad yoga-bhraṣṭo 'bhijāyate
GE07bhg4c06u:2479: | bhoga-vāsanā-prābalyād brahma-lokānte sarva-karma-saṃnyāsāyogyo mahārājo bhavatīty arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c06u:2480: viśvanāthaḥ : tarhi kāṃ gatim asau prāpnotīty ata āha prāpyeti |
GE07bhg4c06u:2481: puṇya-kṛtām aśvamedhādi-yājināṃ lokān iti yogasya phalaṃ mokṣo bhogaś ca bhavati |
GE07bhg4c06u:2482: tatrāpakva-yogino bhogecchāyāṃ satyāṃ yoga-bhraṃśe sati bhoga eva |
GE07bhg4c06u:2483: paripakva-yoginas tu bhogecchāyā asambhavān mokṣa eva |
GE07bhg4c06u:2484: kecit tu paripakva-yogino 'pi daivād bhogecchāyāṃ satyāṃ kardama-saubharyādi-dṛṣṭyā
GE07bhg4c06u:2488: baladevaḥ : aihikīṃ sukha-sampattiṃ tāvad āha prāpyeti |
GE07bhg4c06u:2489: yādṛśa-viṣaya-spṛhayā sva-dharme śithilo yogāc ca vicyuto 'yaṃ tādṛśān viṣayān ātmoddeśyaka-niṣkāma-svadharma-yogārambha-māhātmyena
GE07bhg4c06u:2490: aśvamedhādi-yājināṃ lokān pāpya bhuṅkte tān bhuñjāno yāvatībhis
GE07bhg4c06u:2491: tad-bhoga-tṛṣṇā-vinivṛttis tāvatīḥ śāśvatīḥ bahvīḥ samāḥ saṃvatsarāṃs teṣu
GE07bhg4c06u:2492: lokeṣūṣitvā sthitvā tad-bhoga-vitṛṣṇas tebhyo lokebhyaḥ śucīnāṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:2497: atha vā yoginām eva kule bhavati dhīmatām |
GE07bhg4c06u:2498: etad dhi durlabhataraṃ loke janma yad īdṛśam ||42||
GE07bhg4c06u:2504: | etaj janma stauti īdṛśaṃ yaj janma etad dhi loke durlabhataraṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:2506: madhusūdanaḥ : dvitīyaṃ prati pakṣāntaram āha athaveti |
GE07bhg4c06u:2508: lokān aprāpyaiva yoginām eva daridrāṇāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ na tu śrīmatāṃ rājñāṃ gṛhe yoga-bhraṣṭa-janma tad api durlabham aneka-sukṛta-sādhyatvān
GE07bhg4c06u:2510: yat tu śucīnāṃ daridrāṇāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ brahma-vidyāvatāṃ kule janma |
GE07bhg4c06u:2512: durlabhataraṃ durlabhād api durlabhaṃ loke yad īdṛśaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:2519: baladevaḥ : cirārābdhād yogād bhraṣṭasya gatim āha athaveti |
GE07bhg4c06u:2520: yogināṃ yogam abhyasatāṃ dhīmatāṃ yoga-deśikānāṃ kule bhavaty utpadyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:2522: yogārhāṇāṃ yogam abhyasatāṃ ca kule pūrva-yoga-saṃskāra-bala-kṛtam etaj janma prākṛtānām atidurlabham ||42||
GE07bhg4c06u:2524: tatra taṃ buddhi-saṃyogaṃ labhate paurvadehikam yatate ca tato bhūyaḥ saṃsiddhau kurunandana
GE07bhg4c06u:2525: śrīdharaḥ : tataḥ kiṃ ? ata āha tatreti sārdhena |
GE07bhg4c06u:2530: tataś ca bhūyo 'dhikaṃ saṃsiddhau mokṣe prayatnaṃ karoti ||43||
GE07bhg4c06u:2531: madhusūdanaḥ : etādṛśa-janma-dvayasya durlabhatvaṃ kasmāt ? yasmāt tatra tam iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:2532: tatra dvi-prakāre 'pi janmani pūrva-dehe bhavaṃ paurvadehikam sarva-karma-saṃnyāsa-gurūpasadana-śravaṇa-manana-nididhyāsanānāṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:2533: yāvat-paryantam anuṣṭhitaṃ tāvat paryantam eva taṃ brahmātmaikya-viṣayayā
GE07bhg4c06u:2536: na kevalaṃ labhata eva kintu tatas tal-lābhānantaraṃ bhūyo 'dhikaṃ labdhāyā bhūmer agrimāṃ bhūmiṃ sampādayituṃ saṃsiddhau saṃsiddhir mokṣas tan-nimittaṃ yatate ca prayatnaṃ karoti ca |
GE07bhg4c06u:2538: he kuru-nandana tavāpi śucīnāṃ śrīmatāṃ kule
GE07bhg4c06u:2539: yoga-bhraṣṭa-janama jātam iti pūrva-vāsanā-vaśād anāyāsenaiva jñāna-lābho
GE07bhg4c06u:2543: ekām atha dvitīyāṃ vā tṛtīyāṃ bhūmikām uta |
GE07bhg4c06u:2554: pañcama-ṣaṣṭha-saptama-bhūmayas tu jīvanmukter avāntara-bhedā iti tṛtīye prāg-vyākhyātam |
GE07bhg4c06u:2555: tatra caturthīṃ bhūmiṃ prāptasya mṛtasya jīvan-mukty-abhāve 'pi videha-kaivalyaṃ prati nāsty eva saṃśayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:2556: tad-uttara-bhūmi-trayaṃ prāptas tu jīvann api muktaḥ kim u videha iti nāsty eva bhūmikā-catuṣṭaye śaṅkā |
GE07bhg4c06u:2557: sādhana-bhūta-bhūmikā-traye tu karma-tyāgāj jñānālābhāc ca bhavati śaṅketi tatraiva praśnaḥ
GE07bhg4c06u:2565: śucīnāṃ śrīmatāṃ gehe gupte guṇavatāṃ satām |
GE07bhg4c06u:2568: dṛṣṭvā paripatanty uccair uttaraṃ bhūmikā-kramam || iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:2576: prāktana-saṃskārābhivyaktenāyāsenaiva sambhavān nāsti pūrvasyaiva mokṣaṃ praty āśaṅketi sa vasiṣṭhena nokto bhagavatā tu parama-kāruṇikenāthaveti
GE07bhg4c06u:2579: viśvanāthaḥ : tatra dvividhe 'pi janmani buddhyā paramātma-niṣṭhayā saha saṃyogaṃ paurvadaihikaṃ pūrva-janma-bhavam ||43||
GE07bhg4c06u:2585: tataś ca hṛd-viśuddhi-sva-paramātmāvaloka-rūpāyāṃ saṃsiddhau nimitte svāpotthitavad bhūyo bahutaraṃ yatate |
GE07bhg4c06u:2588: pūrvābhyāsena tenaiva hriyate hy avaśo 'pi saḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:2592: kutaścid ambharāyād anicchann api saṃhriyate viṣayebhyaḥ purāvṛtya
GE07bhg4c06u:2594: tad evaṃ pūrvābhyāsa-balena prayatnaṃ kurvan śanair mucyata itīmam arthaṃ kaimutya-nyāyena sphuṭayati jijñāsur iti
GE07bhg4c06u:2596: yogasya svarūpaṃ jijñāsur eva kevalaṃ na tu prāpta-yogaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:2597: evambhūto yoge praviṣṭa-mātro 'pi pāpa-vaśād yoga-bhraṣṭo 'pi śabda-brahma
GE07bhg4c06u:2602: madhusūdanaḥ : nanu yo brahma-vidāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ sarva-pramāda-kāraṇa-śūnye
GE07bhg4c06u:2604: avyavahita-prāg-bhavīya-saṃskārodbodhāt punar api sarva-karma-saṃnyāsa-pūrvako jñāna-sādhana-lābho bhavatu nāma |
GE07bhg4c06u:2612: akasmād eva bhoga-vāsanābhyo vyutthāpya mokṣa-sādhanonmukhaḥ kriyate, jñāna-vāsanāyā
GE07bhg4c06u:2615: paśya yathā tvam eva yuddhe pravṛtto jñānāyāpratayamāno 'pi pūrva-saṃskāra-prābalyād akasmād eva raṇa-bhūmau
GE07bhg4c06u:2621: sarva-karma-saṃnyāsābhāve 'pi hi kṣatriyasya jñānādhikāraḥ sthita eva |
GE07bhg4c06u:2622: yathā pāṭac-careṇa bahūnāṃ rakṣiṇāṃ madhye vidyamānam api aśvādi-dravyaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:2623: svayam anicchad api tān sarvān abhibhūya sva-sāmarthya-viśeṣād
GE07bhg4c06u:2625: paścāt tu kadāpahṛtam iti vimarśo bhavati |
GE07bhg4c06u:2626: evaṃ bahūnāṃ jñāna-pratibandhakānāṃ madhye vidyamāno 'pi yoga-bhraṣṭaḥ svayam anicchann api jñāna-saṃskāreṇa balavatā svasāmarthaya-viśeṣād eva sarvān pratibandhakān abhibhūyātma-vaśī kriyata iti hṛñaḥ prayogena sūcitam |
GE07bhg4c06u:2627: ataeva saṃskāra-prābalyāj jijñāsur jñātum icchur api yogasya mokṣa-sādhana-jñānasya viṣayaṃ brahma, prathama-bhūmikāyāṃ sthitaḥ saṃnyāsīti yāvat |
GE07bhg4c06u:2628: so 'pi tasyām eva bhūmikāyāṃ mṛto 'ntarāle bahūn viṣayān bhuktvā mahārāja-cakravartināṃ kule samutpanno 'pi yoga-bhraṣṭaḥ
GE07bhg4c06u:2630: karma-pratipādakam ativartate 'tikramya tiṣṭhati karmādhikārātikrameṇa jñānādhikārī bhavatīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:2636: śabda-brahma veda-śāstram ativartate vedokta-karma-mārgam atikramya vartate |
GE07bhg4c06u:2640: hriyate ākṛṣyate avaśo 'pi kenacid vighnenānicchann apīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:2642: yogasya jijñāsur api tu yogam abhyasituṃ pravṛttaḥ śabda-brahma sa-kāma-karma-nirūpakaṃ vedam ativartate |
GE07bhg4c06u:2649: yāti tadā yas tu yogī prayatnād uttarottaram adhikaṃ yoge yatamāno yatnaṃ kurvan yogenaiva saṃśuddha-kilbiṣo vidhūta-pāpaḥ so 'nekeṣu janmasūcitena yogena saṃsiddhaḥ samyag jñānī bhūtvā tataḥ śreṣṭhāṃ gatiṃ yātīti kiṃ vaktavyam ity arthaḥ ||45||
GE07bhg4c06u:2653: karmādhikāram atikramya jñānādhikārī bhavati tadā kim u vaktavyaṃ dvitīyāyāṃ tṛtīyāyāṃ vā bhūmikāyāṃ mṛto viṣaya-bhogānte
GE07bhg4c06u:2654: labdha-mahārāja-kula-janmā yadi vā bhogam akṛtvaiva labdha-brahma-vid
GE07bhg4c06u:2655: brāhmaṇa-kula-janmā yoga-bhraṣṭaḥ karmādhikārātikrameṇa jñānādhikārī bhūtvā tat-sādhanāni sampādya tat-phala-lābhena saṃsāra-bandhanān mucyata iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:2657: prayatnāt pūrva-kṛtād apy adhikam adhikaṃ yatamānaḥ prayatnātirekaṃ kurvan yogī pūrvopacita-saṃskāravāṃs
GE07bhg4c06u:2660: ataeva saṃskāropacayāt puṇyopacayāc cānekair janmabhiḥ saṃsiddhaḥ saṃskārātirekeṇa puṇyātirekeṇa ca prāpta-carama-janmā tataḥ sādhana-paripākād yāti parāṃ prakṛṣṭāṃ gatiṃ muktim |
GE07bhg4c06u:2661: nāsty evātra kaścit saṃśaya ity arthaḥ ||45||
GE07bhg4c06u:2662: viśvanāthaḥ : evaṃ yoga-bhraṃśe kāraṇaṃ yatna-śaithilyam eva ayatiḥ śraddhayopetaḥ ity uktaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:2664: janmāntare punar yoga-prāptir evoktā, na tu saṃsiddhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:2665: saṃsiddhis tu yāvadbhir janmabhis tasya yogasya paripākaḥ syāt |
GE07bhg4c06u:2667: yas tu na kadācid api yoge śaithilya-prayatnaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:2672: iti kardamokteḥ so 'pi naikena janmanā sidhyatīty āha prayatnād yatamānaḥ
GE07bhg4c06u:2680: baladevaḥ : athāmutrikīṃ sukha-sampattim āha prayatnād iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:2682: api prayatnād adhikam adhikaṃ yatamānaḥ pūrva-vighna-bhayāt
GE07bhg4c06u:2683: prayatnādhikyaṃ kurvan yogī tenopacitena prayatnena saṃśuddha-kilbiṣo
GE07bhg4c06u:2686: paripakva-yogo yoga-paripākād eva hetoḥ parāṃ sva-parātmāvaloka-lakṣaṇāṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:2690: karmibhyaś cādhiko yogī tasmād yogī bhavārjuna ||46||
GE07bhg4c06u:2691: śrīdharaḥ : yasmād evaṃ tasmāt tapasvibhya iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:2701: tapasvibhyaḥ kṛcchra-cāndrāyaṇādi-tapaḥ-parāyaṇebhyo 'pi adhika utkṛṣṭo yogī tattva-jñānotpatty-anantaraṃ mano-nāśa-vāsanākṣaya-kārī |
GE07bhg4c06u:2702: vidyayā ta ārohanti yatra kāmāḥ parāgatāḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:2703: na tatra dakṣiṇā yānti nāvadvāṃsas tapasvinaḥ || iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:2706: jñānibhyo 'pi parokṣa-jñānavadbhyo 'pi aparokṣa-jñānavān adhiko mato yogī
GE07bhg4c06u:2708: ajīvan-muktebhyo mano-nāśa-vāsanākṣaya-vattvena jīvan-mukto yogy adhiko mato mama saṃyataḥ
GE07bhg4c06u:2711: yugapat-saṃpāditair yogī jīva-mukto yaḥ sa yogī paramo mata iti prāg-uktaḥ
GE07bhg4c06u:2714: viśvanāthaḥ : karma-jñāna-taop-yogavatāṃ madhye kaḥ śreṣṭha ity apekṣāyām āha tapasvibhyaḥ kṛcchra-cāndrāyaṇādi-tapo-niṣṭhebhyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:2715: jñānibhyaḥ brahmopāsakebhyo 'pi yogī paramātmopāsako 'dhiko mata iti mamedam eva matam iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:2716: yadi jñānibhyo 'py adhikas tadā kim uta karmibhya ity
GE07bhg4c06u:2719: mokṣa-hetus tādṛśād yogād vibhraṣṭsyāntatas tat-phalaṃ bhaved ity abhidhāya yoginaṃ stauti tapasvibhya iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:2722: sakāmeṣṭā-pūrty-ādikṛdbhyaś ca yogī mad-ukta-yogānuṣṭhātādhikaḥ śreṣṭho mataḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:2727: śraddhāvān bhajate yo māṃ sa me yuktatamo mataḥ ||47||
GE07bhg4c06u:2728: śrīdharaḥ : yoginām api yama-niyamādi-parāṇāṃ madhye mad-bhaktaḥ śreṣṭha ity āha yoginām apīti
GE07bhg4c06u:2740: madhusūdanaḥ : idānīṃ sarva-yogi-śreṣṭhaṃ yoginaṃ vadann adhyāyam
GE07bhg4c06u:2743: vasu-rudrādityādi-kṣudra-devatā-bhaktānāṃ sarveṣām api madhye mayi bhagavati vāsudeve puṇya-paripāka-viśeṣād gatena prīti-vaśān niviṣṭena
GE07bhg4c06u:2745: sādhu-saṅgāc ca mad-bhajana evaṃ śraddhāvān atiśayena śraddadhānaḥ sambhajante sevata satataṃ cintayati yo māṃ nārāyaṇam īśvareśvaraṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:2746: sa-guṇaṃ nirguṇaṃ vā manuṣyo 'yam īśvarāntara-sādhāraṇo 'yam ity
GE07bhg4c06u:2747: ādi-bhramaṃ hitvā sa eva mad-bhakto yogī yuktatamaḥ sarvebhyaḥ
GE07bhg4c06u:2748: samāhita-cittebhyo yuktebhyaḥ śreṣṭho me mama parameśvarasya sarvajñasya
GE07bhg4c06u:2751: mad-bhakti-śūnyebhyo mad-bhaktasyaiva śreṣṭhatvāt tvaṃ mad-bhaktaḥ paramo yuktatamo 'nāyāsena bhavituṃ śakṣyasīti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:2752: tad anenādhyāyena karma-yogasya buddhi-śuddhi-hetor maryādāṃ darśayatā tataś ca kṛta-sarva-karma-saṃnyāsasya sāṅgaṃ yogaṃ vivṛṇvatā
GE07bhg4c06u:2754: puruṣārtha-śūnyatāśaṅkāṃ ca śithilatayā karma-kāṇḍaṃ bhajanīyaṃ ca bhagavantaṃ vāsudevaṃ tat-padārthaṃ nirūpayitum agrima-madhyāya-ṣaṭkam
GE07bhg4c06u:2759: viśvanāthaḥ : tarhi yoginaḥ sakāśān nāsty adhikaḥ ko 'pīty avasīyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:2760: tatra maivaṃ vācyam ity āha yoginām api |
GE07bhg4c06u:2763: tapasvibhyo jñānibhyo 'py adhika iti pañcamy-artha-kramāc ca yogibhyaḥ sakāśād apīty arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c06u:2769: karma-jñāna-tapo-yoga-bhakty-ādayas tadvatāṃ madhye yo māṃ bhajeta |
GE07bhg4c06u:2771: karmī tapasvī jñānī ca yogī mataḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:2776: sudurlabhaḥ praśāntātmā koṭiṣv api mahāmune || iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:2781: jñānaṃ ca pañcamenoktaṃ yogaḥ ṣaṣṭhena kīrtitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:2782: prādhānyena tad apy etaṃ ṣaṭkaṃ karma-nirūpakam ||
GE07bhg4c06u:2785: baladevaḥ : tad ittham ādyena ṣaṭkena saniṣṭhasya sādhanāni jñāna-garbhāni
GE07bhg4c06u:2787: bhagavac-charaṇādīni sādhanāny abhidhāsyan tasmāt tasya śraiṣṭhyāvedakaṃ tat-sūtram abhidhatte yoginām iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:2789: na ca nirdhāraṇe ṣaṣṭhīyam astu vakṣyamāṇasya yoginas
GE07bhg4c06u:2794: svarṇa-girer iva tad anyeṣām uccāvacānāṃ girīṇām iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:2795: yaḥ śraddhāvān mad-bhakti-nirūpakeṣu śruty-ādi-vākyeṣu dṛḍha-viśvāsaḥ san māṃ nīlotpala-śyāmalam ājānu-pīvara-bāhuṃ savitṛ-kara-vikasitāravindekṣaṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:2797: kirīṭa-kuṇḍala-kaṭaka-keyūra-hāra-kaustubha-nūpuraiḥ vanamālayā ca vibhrājamānaṃ sva-prabhayā diśo vitamisrāḥ kurvāṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:2802: saundarya-mādhurya-lāvaṇyādibhiś ca guṇa-ratnaiḥ pūrṇaṃ bhajate śravaṇādibhiḥ sevate |
GE07bhg4c06u:2803: mad-gatena mad-ekāsaktenāntarātmanā manasā viśiṣṭas tila-mātram api mad-viyogāsahaḥ sann ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:2805: tapasvy-ādibhyo yogibhyo mad-eka-bhakto yuktatama ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:2806: atra vyācaṣṭe - nanu yoginaḥ sakāśān na ko 'py adhiko 'stīti cet tatrāha yoginām iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:2808: 'pīti dhyānārūḍho yuktaḥ samādhy-ārūḍho yuktataraḥ śravaṇādi-bhaktimāṃs tu yuktatama iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:2810: bhaja ity eṣa vai dhātuḥ sevāyāṃ parikīrtitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:2811: tasmāt sevā budhaiḥ proktā bhakti-śabdena bhūyasī || iti smṛteḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:2812: etāṃ bhaktiṃ śrutir āha śraddhā-bhakti-dhyāna-yogād avehi iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:2813: yasya deve parā bhaktir yathā deve tathā gurau |
GE07bhg4c06u:2814: tasyaite kathitā hy arthāḥ prakāśante mahātmanaḥ || [ŚvetU 6.23] iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:2818: ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyāsitavyo maitreyi [BAU
GE07bhg4c06u:2828: gītā-kathā-sūtram avocad ādye karma dvitīyādiṣu kāma-śūnyam |
GE07bhg4c06u:2829: tat pañcame vedana-garbham ākhyan ṣaṣṭhe tu yogojjvalitaṃ mukundaḥ ||
